Name: Commission System Available Notice
Title: Commission System Available Notice
SubContent: {1: "...Why do I have to write instructions for a system like this? Forget it. Let me have a look...\\nA new commission system developed under the leadership of Babylonia to accept commissions from various resources.\\nFor missions that don't require commandants onsite and can be carried out by Constructs alone, the system will automatically intercept them from the mission center and keep it in the system for commandants to dispatch Constructs to carry out the commissions...\\nThe commission system is accessible via the dorm terminals. Select a commission and dispatch suitable Constructs to carry it out.\\nAfter the commission is finished, Dispatch Permits will be granted for commandants to claim additional supplies...\\n...Sounds good. Looks like the secret-related data can be taken cared of."}

Name: F.O.S. Combat Rule I
Title: F.O.S. Combat Rule I
SubContent: {1: "\\nF.O.S. Combat Rule I:\\nExceptions are the best proof of the battle rules. And screw the battle plan.\\n(Scratched) Hey, don't you afraid that the instructor will beat you up for leaving a record like this."}

Name: Purifying Force Member's Diary I
Title: Purifying Force Member's Diary I
SubContent: {1: 'I saw it coming a long time ago. I\'ve been praying since the day the rumor of her defecting started spreading. I prayed for not seeing her again. However, god loves bad jokes. Attacking citizens sounds a lot like her style. I never doubt it. Lucy is always like that. She has too much of a mind of her own and never cares about what "everyone else thinks." However, everyone has to compromise to survive in this world. Everyone has a righteousness that they don\'t completely believe. Everyone is a sword that is being wielded by someone else. It\'s just who would be willing to hold a sword that is overly loyal to its own will.'}

Name: Purifying Force Member's Diary II
Title: Purifying Force Member's Diary II
SubContent: {1: 'Lucy is smart. She got into the base of the Scavengers. Looking back, I think she deliberately lured me to the nearby area for the Scavengers to find me and stall me. It was when I classified the items that I found these words on the cloth she used to distract me—"The sun finally comes out today after ten rainy days." Of course, I know that the weather, the wind, the humidity can all affect our accuracy in battle, but I think that\'s not what she meant. Sorry, Lucy, I don\'t want to figure out what you wanted to say, even though it\'s undeniable that I once agreed with you to some extent. We can\'t change who we are. You are the prey, and I\'m the hunter.'}

Name: Purifying Force Member's Diary III
Title: Purifying Force Member's Diary III
SubContent: {1: '(Most of the note is burned. One could barely make out the words on it.)\\nI shot an arrow through Lucy\'s power core to save her from unnecessary pain. The smile was forever fixed to her face when the target\'s down. Yes, she was free, hunted down by her best friend. It reminded me of the words she said half-jokingly, "To die a normal death is boring. If there has to be someone to end my life, I hope you would be the one." Now, everything turned out exactly as she had expected. We had an argument about human nature—she thought it was self-destruction, while I thought it was survival. Looking back, I feel everything was predetermined, but this is not important anymore. I\'m just a bit lost. Maybe because the mission to hunt down Lucy took too much time. Now that she has disappeared, who will be my next target?'}

Name: Engineering Force Emergency Maintenance Safety Instruction I
Title: Engineering Force Emergency Maintenance Safety Instruction I
SubContent: {1: '\\n1. When using demolition equipment for rescue, make sure there are no flammable or easily detonated objects or facilities in the area. If any, move them to safe space or take proper precautions before you carry out the operation.\\nNote: Not everyone has a frame like Karenina and her execution, so please make sure you follow the rules. The Engineering Force is not responsible for any direct explosions in the future.'}

Name: Engineering Force Emergency Maintenance Safety Instruction II
Title: Engineering Force Emergency Maintenance Safety Instruction II
SubContent: {1: '\\n2. In conservation areas, always check the collapsed building before repairing it. If there are still intact metal structures, fix them to prevent another collapse.\\nNote: Karenina: The Engineering Force will always remember the time when you demolished a building without report and made everyone in the Engineering Force a lost half-month bonus.'}

Name: A Note Left in a Hurry
Title: A Note Left in a Hurry
SubContent: {1: "I'm not saying that the Support Force is not good, but this is too much... The travel miles in my terminal have been over 100 miles ever since I joined the force! Every! Single! Day! The same distance to go around the world 70 times on foot, if you add it all up!\\nI'm exhausted... Huh? Time to move again? Got it! I'm coming!"}

Name: Edgar's Short Story, "The Pit and the Pendulum"
Title: Edgar's Short Story, "The Pit and the Pendulum"
SubContent: {1: '\\nCommandant, I came across this paper book called "The Pit and the Pendulum" in Babylonia. It seems some part of it is not recorded in the database.\\nLet\'s read it together in the library when you have time.'}

Name: Gray Raven's Maintenance Request I
Title: Gray Raven's Maintenance Request II
SubContent: {1: "Name: Lee\\nConstruct ID: BPN-06\\n\\nRequest List:\\n 1. Firearm Maintenance Tool Kit\\n 2. Common Construct Heat Circulation System Maintenance Parts\\n 3. Exoskeleton Maintenance Oil\\n...\\n Note: Please leave the above items in Gray Raven's lounge."}

Name: Cerberus' Report on Lost Equipment
Title: Cerberus' Report on Lost Equipment
SubContent: {1: "Name: No. 21\\nConstruct ID: BPH-22\\nEquipment Lost: Portable Camp Set x1, Portable Punishing Detector x3, Common Construct Component Replacement Set x6.\\nCause of Loss:\\n Noctis suggested to compete throwing things with No. 21. No. 21 saw Noctis threw the big box into the water. Yes, it was all Noctis' fault. No. 21 thinks so. sdhaiohsaoiaaaaaehwiffffff Noctis also t\\\\\\\\\\dssf forced No. 21 dasdada to not report the truth asdasdadddddddddd..."}

Name: Ground Support Route Plan No.452
Title: Ground Support Route Plan No.452
SubContent: {1: "Based on the locations of Babylonia's conservation areas and the paths left from the Golden Age, the following plan has been made for ground support route No.452...\\nProposed List of Supplies Requested:\\n...\\n\\nThe next stage of the plan is to link up all conservation areas with route No.452 to carry out the follow-up support work."}

Name: Babylonia Dossier Record I
Title: Babylonia Dossier Record I
SubTitle: {1: '[Dossier ID: 990134]'}
SubContent: {1: '"Dr. Wiles\' Report on Construct M.I.N.D. Deviation from Inver-Device Experiments"\\n...\\nAccording to the report, when the prototype Inver-Device started running, the thirteen Constructs involved in the experiment all showed symptoms of M.I.N.D. deviation without abnormal data monitored. Therefore, Dr. Wiles doubted if there was underlying logic difference between the prototype Inver-Device\'s fundamental operation mechanism and the modification preconditions of the Construct.\\n...'}

Name: Babylonia Dossier Record II
Title: Babylonia Dossier Record II
SubTitle: {1: '[Dossier ID: XXX061A]'}
SubContent: {1: '"Report on the WGAA\'s Recycling of X-51 Facilities"\\n...\\nFacility X-51, allegedly one of the locations where Area 51 could be in the Golden Age.\\nMaterials about the functions and personnel of the facility were lost. There is no information of the area found in Operation Acadia and other subsequent assets check.\\nTherefore, the dossier was classified as "unidentified/hidden facility," starting with an X in the title.\\n...'}

Name: Kowloong Base Reconstruction Report
Title: Kowloong Base Reconstruction Report
SubTitle: {1: '[Kowloong Base Reconstruction Report]', 2: '[Notes]'}
SubContent: {1: "Kowloong is a city of a long history. Even the Central Purification Filter ruins shows this. Babylonia doesn't have any records about the appearance and other details about the filter.\\nThe outer base's reconstruction progress has reached 70%. The construction of the outer defense equipment has started. The city has sufficient supplies and is not in need of additional support.", 2: "The Engineering Force has benefited a lot from the exchange and learned about some of Kowloong's construction technologies in the Golden Age. We suggest accepting similar commissions from other forces on the ground to achieve mutual benefits and success."}

Name: A Note Torn off From a Notebook in a Hurry
Title: A Note Torn off From a Notebook in a Hurry
SubContent: {1: 'Looks like someone tore a page off from a notebook and captured their inspiration.\\n\\n"In the middle of the ocean lies our homeland. The drifting boat knows only of her existence. They sing a song and leave the place, carrying yet the same tune when they reach the shore."\\n"She is loved by a group of ordinary men who will die willingly in her arms. The wandering travelers are at sea, but their dreams and souls still cling to her. Who will ever forget her? She is our home."\\n"Children who were born along the journey have never seen her face, yet they seek the coastline still. Unwilling to let go, she will carry the ocean breeze to caress our new generation."'}

Name: The Second Half of the Note
Title: The Second Half of the Note
SubContent: {1: 'The second half of the note records a story that sounds familiar.\\n"The dragon wakes up from its lair, turns around, and shouts loud at the hero."\\n"The hero faces the dragon, protecting the homeland behind him with the sword of justice and bravery."\\n\'The hero says,\\n"The flowers on the continent will bloom again. The princess will return to her kingdom. And you, evil dragon, will be slaughtered by my sword."'}

Name: Engineering Force's Complaint Form
Title: Engineering Force's Complaint Form
SubContent: {1: '...Right, I know nothing about art. I don\'t understand those fancy stuff. But it was them who asked for an emergency repair! I went there in a hurry to get it fixed, and two WGAA guys jumped out and stopped me from getting to work, saying what? "This is a living form of glitch art." "You can\'t stop the art from happening." It took them more than half an hour to finish. When I finally got it done and got back, I got scolded by my captain! Please, do me a favor, artists. Don\'t write anything like "emergency repair needed" for any "glitch art" next time, okay?'}

Name: Archaeological Team Instructions I
Title: Archaeological Team Instructions I
SubContent: {1: '\\n1. Using shovels and trowels to eat is strictly prohibited!\\n2. Using any magic circle and claiming to have the power to revive dead lives are strictly prohibited!\\n3. Immediately ask a medical Construct for help if you are bitten by an insect. Claiming to be a powerful insect warrior is strictly prohibited, because the insect fluid is not capable to add any combat buff to you.'}

Name: Archaeological Team Instructions II
Title: Archaeological Team Instructions II
SubContent: {1: "\\n4. Hitting a ball with the shovel is strictly prohibited.\\n5. Using drones for personal purposes is strictly prohibited. It's a tool, not a toy.\\n6. Babylonia has given us the detectors that can tell the age of any object, so using your tongue is strictly prohibited."}

Name: Archaeological Team Instructions III
Title: Archaeological Team Instructions III
SubContent: {1: '\\n7. Calling colleagues "shovel robot II" or "special cleaner robot" is strictly forbidden.\\n8. Discussions about whether the location is suitable to hide illegal objects are strictly forbidden in public occasions.\\n9. Claiming to be the chosen kid when discovering special objects is strictly forbidden. First of all, you are not a kid. Secondly, the only thing that will choose you is your captain\'s shovel.'}

Name: Archaeological Team Instructions IV
Title: Archaeological Team Instructions IV
SubContent: {1: "\\n10. Pretending to be possessed by a ghost from the Golden Age is strictly prohibited. You can't even memorize the three physical laws of the Golden Age.\\n11. Secretly replacing the ordinary coffee with espresso is strictly prohibited. The last one who did this was already buried.\\n12.Burying the captain or any members is strictly prohibited.(Modified: Burying support Constructs or captain is strictly prohibited, even in the name of celebration.)"}

Name: The Acadia Evacuation, Excerpt 1
Title: The Acadia Evacuation, Excerpt 1
SubContent: {1: "Oh, blood and blades.\\n An impressive battle it was, my brave comrades! But the fight is yet over, for our land is corrupted still, I'm afraid.\\n So stand! Stand! Behind you your homeland you shall guard and defend!\\n Stand! Stand! Skybound our home intends, stop us this bitter earth shan't!"}

Name: The Acadia Evacuation, Excerpt 2
Title: The Acadia Evacuation, Excerpt 2
SubContent: {1: 'Oh, blood and blades. One by one you\'ve sent my friends away.\\n My dearest brother, a brave solder, scars-covered. Before my eyes he fell, the battlefield his blood colored.\\n Beside him, a noble officer, wounded and similar-fated...\\n ...Crawling to the one first erased.\\n Above the blood-soaked man he lies, arms held, his lips pressing the scorched face.\\n "Slow down, dear spirit," was his plea. "Away we\'ll fly, if you would wait for me."\\n Weeper I am, there and then, crying for a love so sincere.'}

Name: The Acadia Evacuation, Excerpt 3
Title: The Acadia Evacuation, Excerpt 3
SubContent: {1: 'Oh, blood and blades. Hell has long been a most familiar place.\\n Lost count I have, the days since I first saw your slaughter some miles away.\\n Standing here, your tally I finally know—feet that no longer dance, faces that no longer kiss, arms that no longer hold.\\n My heart trembles, my fear and dread insurmountable.\\nIf you would hear me, gods, bury my cowardice as you bury my friends.\\n Here I shall stay! My dying breath will guard this land!'}

Name: The Acadia Evacuation, Excerpt 4
Title: The Acadia Evacuation, Excerpt 4
SubContent: {1: 'Oh! Look! Do you see?\\n There, my comrades carried; there, the ship departs! Infinite is the love it holds, eternal will the dreamers last!\\n Away it sails! My hope it hails!\\n Farewell, my friends, my family...\\n Elysium-bound you will be, in the future days when you are free.'}

Name: A Recovered Golden Age Movie?
Title: A Recovered Golden Age Movie?
SubContent: {1: "During the mission, I found WGAA had already recovered the movies directed by director George D. Toro.\\nI think I haven't watched this one... Commandant? Would you like to watch it with me when you have time?"}

Name: A Note With Esthetic Design
Title: A Note With Esthetic Design
SubContent: {1: "The fastest delivery ever! And the cargos were all intact! I'd like to express my gratitude for your outstanding contributions to art! Nevertheless, I wish the guy sat next to me could be more outgoing. I told him several stories about some artworks along the way, but I guess he was too shy to even look at me and even pretend to be sleeping during the second half of our journey. Please tell him that I'll always be there in case he wants to know more about art, and my lounge room number is on the back!"}

Name: World Government Association of Art Ruins Registration Numbers I
Title: World Government Association of Art Ruins Registration Numbers I
SubContent: {1: '\\nArtwork found in Area R-C015-P and their data are as follows:\\n...\\nR-C015-P-S7W9 (5): Item 1, complete.\\nR-C015-P-S7W9 (5): Item 2, slightly damaged.\\nR-C015-P-S7W9 (5): Item 3, fragmented. Fragments: 3-1, 3-2, 3-3, 3-4. No other fragments found yet. Probably already damaged before it was found.\\nR-C015-P-S7W9 (5): Item 4. Cracks on the surface. Not sure whether they were caused by accident during manufacture or an artistic style.\\n...'}

Name: A Casual Note
Title: A Casual Note
SubContent: {1: "What? Another one asking about the secret to staying young? How many times do I have to repeat myself? Early to bed, early to rise. Work out regularly. Don't smoke. Don't drink. Eat healthy. And don't count on the secret recipes. Only those whose prefrontal lobe is full of mud would believe in the elixir of youth."}

Name: A List of Supplies
Title: A List of Supplies
SubContent: {1: 'List of Supplies:\\n20 boxes of serum, 3 boxes of injectors, and 3 boxes of every kind of vital fluid additives. Details as follows...\\nPlease take the list to the supply office in the Star of Life to claim supplies.\\n(There is a "claimed" stamp on the note.)'}

Name: The Last Page of the Mission Record
Title: The Last Page of the Mission Record
SubContent: {1: '\\nToday is the last day. Everything has come to an end. I used the spare time these days to talk to the doctors on the Nighter about their traditional medicine. I have to admit that it was eye-opening. In their eyes, patients are formed by the body, energy and the mind. And diagnoses are made by judging the balance of those three elements... Although I heard of this treatment method before, its delicacy and complexity are beyond my expectation. This is interesting.'}

Name: Ground Conservation Area Onsite Rescue Record I
Title: Conservation Area Onsite Rescue Record I
SubTitle: {2: '[Site Instructions]', 3: '[Update Report Instructions]'}
SubContent: {1: 'Participant: Liv\\nConstruct ID:BPN-08', 2: 'Due to the fierce battle between the Corrupted and people at the conservation areas, many non-Construct combat personnel and conservation area residents have shown various levels of infection.\\nMore serum and medical supplies requested.\\nI believe everything will be fine.', 3: 'The medical supplies are ready. The reinforcement task force is here. Most of the Corrupted were eliminated. The subsequent rescue work is being carried out.'}

Name: Asimov's Handwritten Letter 1
Title: Asimov's Handwritten Letter 1
SubContent: {1: "\\nI didn't expect you to be the one who accepted the commission, so I asked them to bring this handwritten letter to you.\\nIt's time to do the regular Mind Beacon review again. The lab will be available tomorrow. Remember to come over."}

Name: Research Center's Exploration Record I
Title: Research Center's Exploration Record I
SubContent: {1: "I told them that we had to redevelop this abandoned research center, but no one listened.\\nThe newly discovered research findings are very important for the Science Council Section 2's ongoing research and might bring it up to a new level.\\nBesides, I'm thankful for the Constructs who came to support. Were it not for them I would have ended up being under the collapsed lab..."}

Name: Rena's Diary 1
Title: Rena's Diary 1
SubContent: {1: "...The autumn leaves are gone. The winter is here.\\nI'm not sure if our supplies are enough to get us through the winter.\\nI'm scared.\\nThe Forsaken took us in, but they are also short of supplies here.\\nWill we still be able to see the spring?"}

Name: Rena's Diary 2
Title: Rena's Diary 2
SubContent: {1: "The refugees keep coming to the Forsaken camp... We are out to find food every day, but...\\nThere's no grass left around the camp.\\nSometimes I feel angry. Why are the Forsaken still accepting refugees? But I also feel surprised for having such kind of thought.\\nAfter all... They are human beings just like us."}

Name: Rena's Diary 3
Title: Rena's Diary 3
SubContent: {1: "We hid the last bit of food and started to get supplies from the relief point set up by the Forsaken.\\nWe had to do this for we are only halfway through the winter.\\nThe Forsaken's relief food is decreasing rapidly. They have to get more people to maintain the order in the base.\\nEveryone... is trying to survive."}

Name: Rena's Diary 4
Title: Rena's Diary 4
SubContent: {1: 'The weather is getting colder... The snow is big.\\nThe leader of the Forsaken seems to have requested help from Babylonia. I saw people in exoskeletons and Constructs walked off from a transportation craft.\\nOfficers in charge of refugees started to ask people to get supplies, the life-saving supplies from Babylonia.\\nThey... also brought a batch of crop seeds.'}

Name: Rena's Diary 5
Title: Rena's Diary 5
SubContent: {1: 'The first rain in the spring has come down. I... survived the winter.\\nI planted the first batch of corps in the field the Forsaken assigned to me. And they... sprouted.\\nIf...\\nNo, there is no if.\\nEverything will turn out to be fine after this... Right?'}

Name: A Muddy Note
Title: A Muddy Note
SubContent: {1: "(Handwriting 1) Captain, it turns out there are actually nice guys among the Forsaken! Last evening at the new base, Hauss and Keanu treated me two drinks and we had a long chat! It was a shame that you were not there... Right, we played an interesting game together! I won two hardtacks! I heard that you are going to the new base with us. Would you like to kill time with them as well?\\n(Handwriting 2) I'm not going, and you must not go either. Now go and return the supplies."}

Name: Forsaken Camp Record I
Title: Forsaken Camp Record I
SubContent: {1: "x/x\\n13 refugees accepted. They claimed to have come from the refugee camp in the northwest. The Corrupted destroyed their camp and they were the only ones who survived.\\nAmong them, there are 4 young men and 3 women aged between 20 and 40, 1 boy and 1 girl aged between 8 and 16, and 3 old men and 1 old woman aged above 50.\\nWe've run out of space in the campsite. Tents and supplies are needed. I've sent the report to the Forsaken HQ, but I know they are also in lack of supplies.\\n\\nx/x\\n4 refugees accepted. 2 old men above 50 and 1 8-year-old girl, and 1 5-year-old boy.\\nThey claimed to have come from the south. The Hetero-Creatures came, and they ran with their family. There were a dozen of them, but only four survived.\\nI let them stay in the tent with other two elders. It's cramped, but at least they have a shelter now.\\nThere is a batch of supplies from the Forsaken HQ, but it's far from enough. The young men volunteered to hunt and plant. Hope we can make it through this winter safe and sound."}

Name: Forsaken Camp Record II
Title: Forsaken Camp Record II
SubContent: {1: 'x/x\\n2 young men were injured and 1 of them died when hunting a wild boar. Besides, there are 2 registered deaths of elders.\\nWe are short of medicine. As the manager of the camp, I can only take out the last anti-inflammatory drug from the warehouse and hope it can help.\\n\\nx/x\\n1 young man died.\\nNo one noticed that his rib was broken for there is no doctors in the camp.\\nI reported it to the HQ. The reply was that they would send some rescue guys to flexibly support the camps in the area...'}

Name: Forsaken Camp Record III
Title: Forsaken Camp Record III
SubContent: {1: "x/x\\n3 refugees accepted. 1 man and 1 woman aged between 20 to 40. 1 boy aged between 8 to 16.\\nToday, several unknown Constructs brought us medicine and other supplies and check the young hunters who got injured while hunting.\\nThey said Babylonia's Mr. Watanabe sent them here to support.\\nThank you, Mr. Watanabe.\\nAs for Babylonia... Forget it... After all, they are still willing to help us. I...\\n...I just can't say it."}

Name: Broken Yellow Note
Title: Broken Yellow Note
SubContent: {1: "The soldiers were trained in the sound of the drums. I traveled south alone when they were building the walls and ditches.\\nI fought for the lord but he wouldn't let me go home.\\nWhere am I? Where is my horse? Maybe in the forest.\\nI made a vow to you, promising to grow old together.\\nBut we've been apart for too long. How could I fulfill my promise to you?\\n(There is some blood at the end of the note. It's hard to tell what happened to the writer.)"}

Name: Kowloong's Magical Girl: Glitter... What?
Title: Kowloong's Magical Girl: Glitter... What?
SubContent: {1: "I came across a manga during the mission. I think it's called... Kowloong's Magical Girl?\\nSounds like a girl manga. I've given it to the WGAA. Hope they can restore it."}

Name: A New Recovered Animation!
Title: A New Recovered Animation!
SubContent: {1: "Commandant! I found a new recovered animation! It's about Kowloong! Kowloong's Magical Girl: Glitter Warrior!\\nI never thought that Kowloong's Magical Girl had a sequel! Can we watch it together in the future!"}

Name: A Small, Old Note
Title: A Small, Old Note
SubContent: {1: "(A small, old note with a few lines of small, blurry print)\\n～Your brief life I mourn;\\nwhat does mine bring?～\\n～Your brief life I mourn;\\nwhere will mine rest?～\\n～See the silver coat clothed\\nin a mayfly's birth.～\\nWhat is mine worth?～"}

Name: Specialties of the Nighter of Nona Ouroboros
Title: Specialties of the Nighter of Nona Ouroboros
SubContent: {1: "The specialties of the Nighter of Nona Ouroboros... are a bit weird. I have made a list and attached it below. If Commandant is interested...\\n...I guess you're not.\\nCanned cocoon jelly, razor honey, dried earthworms, virus-free oxygen tanks..."}

Name: Arctic Route Forest Guards' Specialty Record
Title: Forest Guards' Specialty Record
SubContent: {1: "The Arctic Route also has many specialties, but it seems that only the leaves of the pine trees here can be made into pine needle tea. There are also various delicious fresh berries, the Forest Guards' homemade berry cakes, and so on.\\nWould you like to give them a go next time, Commandant?"}

Name: Gift From a Fisherman
Title: Gift From a Fisherman
SubContent: {1: "Thank you for your help. I was prepared for the worst... Forget about it. I don't have other thing except the salted fish in the package. Give it a go if you don't mind.\\nP.S. The fish is very salty, so it's suggested to have it as a side dish.\\nP.S. I heard that Constructs can't take too much food at a time. Don't worry. The fish can be stored for a long time. You can eat it slowly."}

Name: Excerpt of Amberia Data Directory
Title: Excerpt of Amberia Data Directory
SubTitle: {1: '[Amberia Data Directory]', 2: '[Hidden] [No.618 — Codes]'}
SubContent: {1: 'Construct Mη-VI140\\n     Manufacturing Purpose: The elimination of all Punishing Virus.\\n     ...', 2: "Instructions on Amberia's Control System Configuration Control Codes\\n     About Matrix Information Processing Module Issues\\n     Solutions to Hardware Structure Issues\\n     About CAN Bus Protocol Content\\n     ...\\n\\n Sleeping Code: Old bionic mod — Derek's voice could be used as one of the sleeping codes of Amberia's control system."}

Name: Arctic Route Union Rescue Scene Notice I
Title: Rescue Scene Notice I
SubTitle: {2: '[Notice]'}
SubContent: {1: "Please note that this is an Arctic Route Union rescue notice written by a kind soul. Any Construct or soldier who's with Arctic Route Union's rescue commission, please read it before heading to the site.", 2: '1. Some bases deep in the Arctic Route Union are really cold. Please make sure you take enough warm clothes and winter equipment with yourself.\\n2. Most of the area in the Arctic Route Union is guarded by Forest Guards. You don\'t want to cross them unless you want to be kicked away by their hooves ("by their hooves" is scratched off).\\n3. Avoid icebergs if you can.\\n...\\n10.The Arctic Route Union\'s specialty, the pine needle tea, tastes great. I haven\'t had it for a very long time. If anyone is on any commission to go there, please get some for me. Our address is xxxxx, ..., Babylonia.'}

Name: Akdilek Lullaby
Title: Akdilek Lullaby
SubContent: {1: "I found a lullaby on the paper when I was on the train mission. I'll share this nostalgic song with you, Commandant.\\n\\n～Sleep, sleep, my child,～\\n～For there are fireflies here that will keep your heart alight.～\\n～Sleep, sleep, my child,～\\n～May your dreams be as peaceful as the summer night...～\\n～May hope forever be by your side.～\\n～Your worries will drift with the wind.～\\n～The sun will greet you with a gentle smile so bright.～\\n～So sleep, sleep, my child.～\\n～For only when you wake up free of worries～\\n～Can you smile at the world warmly.～"}

Name: Firefly
Title: Firefly
SubContent: {1: 'I found a book on the train and copied some sentences that I found interesting from it. The book is called Firefly, I think. I can bring it to you if you\'re interested, Commandant.\\n\\n...We\'re as mundane as grass. See, this is what it says in the book. "Wild grass strikes no deep roots, has no beautiful flowers and leaves, yet it imbibes dew, water and the blood and flesh of the dead, all trying to rob them of life."\\n"As long as it lives, it is trampled upon and mown down, until it dies and decays."\\n...But that doesn\'t mean wild grass is worthless.\\n"You die because you lived, and you rot because you were. Dying weeds bear new lives, and while the skies might not be at their brightest now, the fire burning across the grassfield will light up the skies all the same."'}

Name: Notebook Fragment With Messy Handwriting
Title: Notebook Fragment With Messy Handwriting
SubContent: {1: '(A worn note with illegible words.)\\n\\n"Friend, the time\'s close.\\nI\'ll turn to the darkness and wander in the nothingness.\\nYou still expect my largesse. What can I offer you? Ceaseless, it is still darkness and void and—stop.\\nBut I\'d like only darkness, or to vanish into your daytime; I\'d only like a void that never seizes your heart.\\nI\'d like that, friend—\\nI travel alone—not only without you, but in darkness without other shadows.\\nOnly myself, submerged by darkness, in that world wholly mine."'}

Name: 318-B Maintenance Notice
Title: 318-B Maintenance Notice
SubContent: {1: "\\n318-B Maintenance Notice:\\nThe rivet nuts are loose. We request to purchase a batch of disc self-lock gaskets and threadlocker to prevent the bolts from falling.\\n\\n...\\n\\nSophia's Note: The previous guy brought the wrong wrench. No need to purchase a new one. I fixed it."}

Name: Babylonia Exchange Record I
Title: Babylonia Exchange Record I
SubTitle: {2: '[Content]'}
SubContent: {1: 'Reporter: Akdilek Soldier', 2: 'Babylonian soldiers are powerful fighters! Both the Constructs and ordinary soldiers!\\nBut we are no less than them. Haha. They are better on flat ground and open building area, but we are better at battles in streets and cars!\\nWe also gained precious battle experience through the exchange. I believe the Babylonia feels the same!\\nHaha, I hope we can have more exchanges like this!'}

Name: Akdilek's Exchange Request
Title: Akdilek Commercial Alliance's Exchange Request With Babylonia
SubTitle: {2: '[List of Exchange Personnel]'}
SubContent: {1: "To face the challenges in the present world, Akdilek Commercial Alliance puts a high value on its relations to Babylonia and hopes to deepen the friendly cooperation with it.\\nTherefore, Akdilek has sent its senior officers to Babylonia's ground conservation areas for cultural exchange to achieve mutual understanding and common benefit and lay a solid foundation for future cooperation.", 2: '...'}

Name: Song of Life
Title: Song of Life
SubContent: {1: "It's surprising that someone wrote it down... It seems that you haven't heard it before, Commandant? I'll sing it to you next time.\\n\\n～Life is like a round lake... along the path we take.～\\n～Running with the birds, playing in the dirt～\\n～I walk on and on, but where have you gone?～\\n～I'll become the wind's gaze, countless nights and days.～\\n～Chasing your wake... around the lake...～\\n～Just stay a little longer... Don't walk away so somber...～"}

Name: An Ancient Song
Title: An Ancient Song
SubContent: {1: "(The note is torn and bloodstained, but the words on it are still legible.)\\n\\n...I'll become the wind's gaze...\\n..Countless nights and days... Chasing your wake... Around the lake... Just stay a little longer...\\n...Oh, this lake... Boundless and silent...\\n...Even though we have changed...\\n...Believe that we will meet again...\\n...Believe... This is only a momentary parting..."}

Name: A Neatly Written Note
Title: A Neatly Written Note
SubContent: {1: '\\nIndeed, the sea can be purified. The clean, blue sea will return one day.\\nBuildings can be repaired. When the disaster is over, new buildings will rise again. People will build one after another along the ruins.'}

Name: Someone Noted These Words Down
Title: Someone Noted These Words Down
SubContent: {1: '\\nBut something can never be brought back again once they are damaged.\\nThe pride of mankind, the faiths that people once believed in.\\nIf we give up all of them for a false dawn, what can mankind possibly remember years later under the shelter of new buildings?'}

Name: Broken Page of the Diary I
Title: Broken Page of the Diary I
SubContent: {1: "(The edges of the paper are slightly burned.)\\n\\nThe remaining food and serum can't last us through this winter.\\nWe must move. We need to find enough food, so Ray and others can—"}

Name: Broken Page of the Diary II
Title: Broken Page of the Diary II
SubContent: {1: "(The note is tattered. Why did they make a road sign with the torn diary?)\\n\\nWhen can we arrive at our destination?\\nWe have finished all our food.\\nI don't know how long we can last."}

Name: Broken Page of the Diary III
Title: Broken Page of the Diary III
SubContent: {1: "\\n\\nBut I can't die here.\\nI still want to see him, for one last time.\\nIf my death has its value, I wouldn't complain at all.\\nBut I haven't brought anything back—"}

Name: Broken Page of the Diary IV
Title: Broken Page of the Diary IV
SubContent: {1: "(Did they... walk out the desert alive?)\\n\\nThe compass is probably broken.\\nBefore we realized, we had walked to a totally unknown area.\\nWe'll die in this desert if we don't hurry.\\nBut walking fast will increase our water consumption.\\nWhat should we do? Where should we go?"}

Name: Diary of a Conservation Area Construct
Title: Diary of a Conservation Area Construct
SubContent: {1: '\\nI wanna quit. Every day I wake up and patrol. I close my eyes and patrol... When is this going to end? What is the meaning to live a life like this...?'}

Name: Broken Morning Daily
Title: Broken Morning Daily
SubContent: {1: '\\nI found a newspaper from a long time ago... It\'s interesting. Do you want to read it, Commandant?\\n\\n...Recently, there has been a rumor saying "salt can cure the Punishing Virus", which has forced up the salt price. Many have fallen victims to this and hoarded a great amount of salt. There is not special treatment to the Punishing Virus. Please don\'t believe in any unproven remedies to avoid loss. At this stage, staying in the safe area and away from mechanoids and believing in science are the best way to fight the virus.'}

Name: Broken News Headlines
Title: Broken News Headlines
SubTitle: {2: 'How many times do we have to repeat the tragedy at the Angel Elementary School?'}
SubContent: {1: 'City 075...? A Golden Age elementary school above the military underground facility?', 2: "The Angel Elementary School in City 075 was an old charity boarding school where many homeless kids graduated. After the Punishing Virus broke out, the principal evacuated the students to the bomb shelter under the school and save the resources for the most urgent demands.\\nBut his kindness was not answered with due reward, mechanoids' attacks became more and more severe. The teachers and students in the shelter kept calling for help without response.\\nNow, they are forever left on the road to the rescue station. How many times do we have to repeat the tragedy like this?"}

Name: Broken City Express
Title: Broken City Express
SubContent: {1: 'Medical Center 09. Is this where the Punishing Virus started to spread?\\n\\nThe conversion of the Ninth Psychiatric Hospital in City 011 will reportedly finish by 31 October. With its new defense system and medical facilities, the former psychiatric hospital will be renamed Medical Center 09 and responsible for receiving patients with sepsis infected by the Punishing Virus.\\nThe original patients have been transferred to other facilities, and Medical Center 09 will not be receiving patients with mental disorders in the future. The facility apologized for any inconvenience.'}

Name: Farewell to the Heroes, Act 3, Scene 6
Title: Farewell to the Heroes, Act 3, Scene 6
SubContent: {1: 'A note with the excerpt of the drama found on the ground by accident... Is the drama still playing in Babylonia\'s theaters?\\n\\nFarewell to the Heroes, Act 3, Scene 6\\n"Imagine. Hope the freedom of imagination will transcend your deaths."\\n"And may love and light be with you in the future full of freedom."'}

Name: A Nicely Printed Note
Title: A Nicely Printed Note
SubContent: {1: "(There is a nicely printed list on the note.)\\n\\n Star Wars\\nGinga Toppa: the Spiral Eye\\nClimber's High\\n...\\nThe Dawn Adventure of the Stardust Knight"}

Name: Venus Splash Park Specialty Record
Title: Venus Splash Park Specialty Record
SubContent: {1: '\\nVenus Splash Park\'s specialties... You didn\'t have them last time, Commandant, such as "Venus Splash Park Special: Classic Summer Shaved Ice", "Venus Splash Park Special: Classic Summer Shaved Ice", and "Venus Splash Park Special: Shark-speare Life-Size Simulated Doll".'}

Name: A Broken Note
Title: A Broken Note
SubContent: {1: '\\nHe promised me... He promised! He, no, they were in this together... From the very beginning... Yes, the very beginning... What did I do...? This is already...\\n(The rest is a series of scratched unintelligible scribbles.)'}

Name: "Final Gift"
Title: "Final Gift"
SubContent: {1: '(Under the note is a plain-colored envelope with "To Lua" on it. Besides, there is a white paper flower that is partly bloodstained.)\\n\\nPlease hand this letter and the flower to Lua if I don\'t wake up.'}

Name: Note With Coffee Stains
Title: Note With Coffee Stains
SubContent: {1: "\\n—Arrgh! Where did all these reports come from...?\\nWhy do you have to submit the reports at the last minute, Commandants?\\nData summarization report summary, analysis report summary... Am I going to work overtime again...?\\nI haven't gotten off work on time even for a single day this week!\\Sigh... Forget it. They also worked hard... Let's get some coffee..."}

Name: Note Left on the Desk
Title: Note Left on the Desk
SubContent: {1: "(Handwriting 1)\\nI heard that the school was selecting people to support the trail. Wanna give it a go?\\n\\n(Handwriting 2)\\nNot really. Why didn't you use the terminal? Notes are obsolete.\\n\\n(Handwriting 1)\\nDon't you get it? Retro is all the rage now. We would be dead if we ever got caught by the instructor when using the terminal.\\n\\n(Handwriting 2)\\nYou have a point there—\\n\\n(Handwriting 3)\\nWhat makes you think that the instructor won't see you throwing notes back and forth?"}

Name: Hetero-Creature Questionnaire?Report 1
Title: Hetero-Creature Questionnaire?Report 1
SubTitle: {1: '[Hetero-Creature Questionnaire?Report: The Birth of Hetero-Creatures]'}
SubContent: {1: 'Our examination of the "Red Tide" data sample has shown that the Punishing Virus has entered an early stage of biological evolution.\\nThe "Red Tide" devours and deconstructs machines and creatures and uses the machines\' parts or the creatures\' energy to form a brand-new creature—the "Hetero-Creature", named by the Science Council\'s CTO.\\nOur reasonable guess is that the "Red Tide" is mimicking the biological evolution of life on Earth but in a form that is way more twisted than any plant or animal on the planet.\\nFrom the records recycled by the ground force we see that Ascendant Gabriel has interfered the Hetero-Creature\'s form.\\nWas the disaster co-created by the Ascendants and the "Red Tide"?\\n...'}

Name: Hetero-Creature Questionnaire?Report 2
Title: Hetero-Creature Questionnaire?Report 2
SubTitle: {1: '[Hetero-Creature Questionnaire?Report: The Evolution of Hetero-Creatures]'}
SubContent: {1: 'After researching what we have, we still can\'t figure out the exact evolution mechanism of the Hetero-Creature or if the Hetero-Creature possesses physiological phenomena similar to those of the life on Earth, not to mention the trigger of the Punishing Virus\' biological evolution tendency.\\nFrom City 075 where the Red Tide was first found to Pulia Forest Park Ruins and City 047..., they have obviously gotten stronger. Compared to the first Hetero-Creatures, the current ones resemble the existing life on Earth more. Some even show behaviors of mimicking human beings. For example, the "Red Tide Projection" that keeps repeating what the death had said. The Science Council decided to name them the "Hetero-Sapien."\\nThis makes us doubt whether the Ascendants are expecting the Hetero-Creature to replace life on Earth or even human beings.\\nIf that\'s the case, why did they stop evolving the Hetero-Creature\'s into the original malformed and stronger form?\\nWe need to study on more samples before we draw a conclusion here.\\n...'}

Name: Hetero-Creature Questionnaire?Report 3
Title: Hetero-Creature Questionnaire?Report 3
SubTitle: {1: '[Hetero-Creature Questionnaire?Report: Special Hetero-Creatures in the Copperfield Aquarium]'}
SubContent: {1: '\\nBased on the data the Purifying Force recycled from Copperfield Aquarium, we realized that the Hetero-Creatures there were greatly different from those on the ground—they were crazier and more chaotic.\\nAfter observing and examining massive samples recycled from the Red Tide Influx battle, we found that these Hetero-Creatures had never been touched by the Ascendants. They were directly born in the Red Tide.\\nThey are a result of a great deal of memories and M.I.N.D. Shards of the dead living in Hetero-Creatures. The Science Council thus named them "Hosts."\\n\\nThe intel on the Ascendants sent back to us later revealed that the Ascendants were planning to revive the dead in the Hetero-Creatures. Purifying Force\'s Vice-Captain Chiko is a victim of this. Everyone involved in defending the coast has witnessed how much impact "she" brought.\\n...'}

Name: Purifying Force Undercover Record 1
Title: Purifying Force Undercover Record 1
SubTitle: {1: '[Purifying Force Undercover Records]'}
SubContent: {1: "Today was the first time I went on an undercover mission with the senior! The senior asked me to record everything carefully to report to the captain later. He also said he entrusted this glorious but arduous mission to me because I was new! I'm really looking forward to the report to the captain!\\nAhem, so this is the official mission report!\\nWe have met the Construct sent to support us and successfully sneaked into the target conservation area, but the target figure didn't show up.\\nThe investigation result shows that the target figure has already left with the area's expedition and will be back in about three days.\\nIt seems that it's going to be a long slog."}

Name: Sincere Self-Reflection Letter
Title: Sincere Self-Reflection Letter
SubTitle: {1: '[Self-Reflection Letter]', 2: "[Instructor's Reply]"}
SubContent: {1: "I'm sorry. I shouldn't have passed notes in class, especially when I hadn't finished the homework of the command automation engineering course and under the instructor's nose.\\nThe instructor's teaching is still ringing in my ears. I'm deeply in awe. And I realize how serious my mistake is.\\nI'll be careful not to be found by the instructor next time. (Scratched out)\\nI won't pass notes next time and will be one hundred percent focused on the class. On deep reflection on my behavior, I wrote this reflection letter with a painful heart.\\n", 2: 'Write "I\'m deeply in awe" a hundred times.'}

Name: Engineering Force's Demolishment Plan
Title: Engineering Force's Demolishment Plan
SubTitle: {1: "[Engineering Force's Demolishment Plan]"}
SubContent: {1: '...\\nWe plan to demolish the 3 problematical buildings in the conservation area and move 21 people out.\\nBuilding A is not suitable for living due to the serious cracks in the load-bearing beams caused by the illegal construction of the basement.\\nBuilding B is not suitable for living due to cracks in the walls and a tilt of 53.8 cm caused by the unstable base eroded by the river water.\\nBuilding C is not suitable for living due to reasons similar to Building B, having a tilt of 58.7 cm and cracks in the walls.\\nThe residents will be transferred to the tents in the center of the conservation area and wait to be transferred back after the replacement buildings are constructed.\\n...\\n\\n...Why on earth am I reviewing my own stuff? This is weird! Teddy! TEDDY!'}

Name: A Muddy Note
Title: A Muddy Note
SubContent: {1: '\\nOh no, the captain is stressing the relic coding rules again. Damn it. The captain must find the manuscript someone made while coding the relics.\\n\\nI told them to be careful! Keep those manuscripts out of the archives! Use the official codes for archiving! Damn, damn, he is flipping through the past manuscripts...\\n\\nNo... I would lose my supplies if he finds it... No...'}

Name: Constellia's Observation Notes on Mechanoids 1
Title: Constellia's Observation Notes on Mechanoids 1
SubTitle: {1: "[Constellia's Observation Notes on Mechanoids]"}
SubContent: {1: 'During the second week in Constellia, we took some notes about some mechanoids\' behaviors and activities.\\nThese mechanoids in Area B have spontaneously divided themselves into "Fantastical Mechanical Impressionism", the "Surrealist Mechanical Fauvism", and "Multidimensional Mechanical Cubism", with different color modules and using the streets as their canvas and battlefield, printing patterns that we don\'t understand at this moment.\\n\\n[Image] [Image] [Image]\\n\\nArt by mechanoids. How wonderful...'}

Name: The Archaeological Team's Dos and Don'ts for Relic Coding 1
Title: Dos and Don'ts for Relic Coding 1
SubTitle: {1: "[The Archaeological Team's Dos and Don'ts for Relic Coding 1]"}
SubContent: {1: 'Relics should be arranged in the order of "Time & Big Area & Small Area & Excavation Grid Code & Stratum: Unearthed Relic Serial Number."\\n...\\nR for relic, referring to relics before the Golden Age.\\nG for the Golden Age.\\nP for the Post-Pandemic Age.\\n...\\nC for city, referring to abandoned cities/conservation areas (numeric codes required)\\n...\\nR for research institute, referring to ruins of research institutes.\\nM for mansion, referring to ruins of mansions/buildings.\\nP for park, referring to ruins of parks/natural reserves.\\nT for tombs.\\n...'}

Name: The Archaeological Team's Dos and Don'ts for Relic Coding 2
Title: Dos and Don'ts for Relic Coding 2
SubTitle: {1: "[The Archaeological Team's Dos and Don'ts for Relic Coding 2]"}
SubContent: {1: "...\\nIf it is hard to tell the functions of areas in a city/conservation area, then use grid codes.\\nStratum Codes: (1), (2), (3), and so on.\\n...\\nExcavation Grid Codes: Follow the coordinate system numbering by using north, east, south and west.\\n...\\nRelics (Small): Serial number\\n...\\nFor example, the code for the first small relic excavated from pre-Golden Age ruins in stratum 5 of the excavation grid at south 8, west 9 from 12 o'clock in a park of City 015 should be R-C015-P-S7W9 (5): 1."}

Name: Report Fragment
Title: Report Fragment
SubContent: {1: '\\nI saved a strange Construct when I was out on mission today. No matter how I asked him, he just kept yelling something like... "angel"? Or something similar?\\nI don\'t understand, but it was really weird. Perhaps I started to have illusions due to the loss of vital fluid. Thankfully, I had Herios Preparation on me. As expected, the Construct was back to normal after I gave him a shot, able to describe to me where the main wound was.\\nWell... Sometimes Herios Preparation is more useful than I expected...'}

Name: Paper Stained by a Lot of Blood
Title: Paper Stained by a Lot of Blood
SubContent: {1: "Peggy\\nConstruct. Rescued 3 injured. Suffering from great loss of vital fluid and serious infection.\\n\\nBoffman\\nHuman soldier. Hit by a metal fragment when bandaging the injured while covering casualty transfer. Confirmed dead.\\n\\nEnca\\nConstruct. Led the battlefield rescue team to save 10 injured Constructs and humans. Covered her comrades with her body. Suffering from severe infection and chaotic M.I.N.D. Before completely turning into a Corrupted, she...\\n\\n\\nMy... my name is Beg. I don't want to beg for your mercy, but...\\nPlease remember them.\\nI just don't want you to... forget them..."}

Name: Conservation Area Reinforcement Record 1
Title: Conservation Area Reinforcement Record 1
SubTitle: {1: '[Conservation Area C Bed K032 Ward Round Record]'}
SubContent: {1: "Time: DD MM, 8:00 a.m.\\nPatient: Female. Age: Unknown. Main symptom: paroxysmal chest distress and shortness of breath.\\nThe patient has been suffering from coronary heart disease for more than 20 years.\\nNow the patient reports chest distress and weakness of limbs.\\nPhysical examination shows that the patient has a pale face, tachypnea, (this part is stained by mud and blood), and pitting edema over her legs...\\nBased on the clinical signs and symptoms, the patient is diagnosed with acute angina. Isosorbide mononitrate tablets were prescribed. There is no oxygen or nitroglycerin tablets. Please pay attention to the patient's vital signs.\\n\\n(On the small note attached to the paper: No nitroglycerin tablets due to the debris flow. We only have a few isosorbide mononitrate tablets.)"}

Name: Conservation Area Intensive Care Patient Record 1
Title: Conservation Area Intensive Care Patient Record 1
SubTitle: {1: '[Intensive Care Patient Record]'}
SubContent: {1: '...\\nLindsey, 21 y.o.\\nFell from height\\nOpen fracture, skin damaged, open wound in skin exposing broken bone, Hemopneumothorax, ruptured spleen, ruptured liver\\nSeptic shock\\nMedical History: Nil\\nCPR performed. Return of spontaneous circulation\\nIn urgent need of AB blood, splenectomy and liver repair.\\nHowever, such complicated surgeries cannot be performed in the current environment.\\n...\\n\\nIs there really nothing we can do?'}

Name: Sticky Note With the Names of Some Weird Medicines
Title: Sticky Note With the Names of Some Weird Medicines
SubTitle: {2: '[Sudden Death Prevention Tips!!!]'}
SubContent: {1: '(Looks like someone carefully transcribed it and stuck it somewhere, but there are traces of the note being torn off brutally from somewhere.)\\n\\n', 2: 'Energy Increase: Omega-3 (polyunsaturated fat), Magnesium threonate, Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol), B vitamins\\nAntifatigue: Concentrated vitamin C\\nCardiovascular Health: Purified EPA fish oil\\n...'}

Name: A Small Note Between the Pages of the Report
Title: A Small Note Between the Pages of the Report
SubContent: {1: "I don't like sampling missions on the ground.\\nIt's not because I'm lazy. It's just that I don't like what I see every time I go up there.\\nIt's always gloomy with dark clouds covered with smoke. I can always hear strange noises from both sides and sometimes Scavengers' screams, when traveling on the ground by vehicle.\\nI was scared. So when they invited me to rest in the conservation area, I refused them and chose to stay in the vehicle by myself.\\nThis is not the ground described in Babylonia's books. In those books, the ground is full of colorful flowers, lush forests, magnificent falls, and jagged mountains. Not like this.\\nThe sampling mission is done. I can't wait to go back to Babylonia...\\n\\n(There are some bloodstains on the back.)"}

Name: A Rough Note
Title: A Rough Note
SubContent: {1: "...The vehicle was attacked by a bunch of Corrupted who came out of nowhere. They didn't get into the car, but it was turned over and knocked me unconscious.\\nThe Construct escorting us came in time and saved me. It was the first time I stepped into a conservation area, but this place was different from what I had expected...\\nThere was a small garden in the corner with flowers I had never seen in Babylonia. Everyone looked exhausted but full of hope for the future.\\nI heard them talking about how we were gonna move to another place in the safe zone. By then, there would be no need to worry about the invasion of the Corrupted. By then, we are gonna have a bigger vegetable garden...\\nI suddenly felt less scared of the ground."}

Name: A New Year's Card With Lanterns
Title: A New Year's Card With Lanterns
SubContent: {1: 'Please bring this letter to the "Merchant", thank you!\\n\\nDear "Merchant", we are the members of the "Forsaken Backup Squad K-107." Do you remember us?\\nLong time no see. We\'ve missed you very much. The year is about to end, and we\'ve made you a lantern this year. We didn\'t know how to send it to you, so we asked the Constructs who came to help in Oasis. Hope you can receive this delayed new year\'s card.\\nAlthough it would be a long time after the year started when you receive it, we still wish you a happy new year!'}

Name: Paper Torn off From a Notebook
Title: Paper Torn off From a Notebook
SubContent: {1: "I kinda like my life right now.\\nI patrol around Oasis every day. And if I get the morning shift, I can visit the tents in the center in the afternoon after the free lunch. You can always find some weird courses there. Sometimes they teach you how to plant seeds. Sometimes it's about how to stop bleeding quickly and bandage the wound. I remember there was once a course about how to quickly find edible grass and mushrooms in the wild.\\nOnce I learn how to plant, I can apply for a job transfer. I heard the agricultural department was short of hands.\\nHope I can enjoy the fruit of my own labor next year.\\nAh, tomorrow is gonna be a fine day!"}

Name: A Carefully Preserved Note
Title: A Carefully Preserved Note
SubContent: {1: "Recipe for Self-made Saline: Self-made saline. 1,000ml cooled boiled water with 9g salt.\\nCan be used to clean wounds.\\n\\nSelf-made Electrolyte Water: Fruits (or carrots, pumpkins) + Warm Water + A Little Salt + Sugar\\nCan be used to replenish various electrolytes needed by the human body when having a high fever or diarrhea...\\n\\n...\\n\\nDon't bother me! I'm going over today's notes! I'll be able to work for the medical squad after I finish this!\\nHehe, then I'll be able to provide for my family too!"}

Name: Daily-life Medical Tip 1
Title: Daily-life Medical Tip 1
SubTitle: {1: '[Daily-life Medical Tip: How to Fast Bandage a Wound]'}
SubContent: {1: "...\\nFirst, check the wound. Wash it with the saline.\\nIf the wound is bleeding, press it or use a tourniquet to stop bleeding and ask medical workers for help immediately. We will give you some tourniquets and saline packs. Put them in your medical kit. Please apply a dressing to the wound before bandaging it with the tourniquet. If you don't have any tourniquets, you can use strong ropes or cloth with a width greater than 3cm instead.\\nBandage the wound tightly with fast and gentle movements.\\nNext, I'm going to show you several ways of bandaging a wound with this staff member..."}

Name: Note Full of Large Letters
Title: Note Full of Large Letters
SubContent: {1: "\\nKowloong is really big!\\nAnd the location of the mission is... Hmm, Xuwu Line? Right? To support in the battle at Xuwu Street?\\nWhere the hell is Xuwu Line?\\nWe got there and fought for a long time, but our boss sent comms to blame us for not showing up! That's when we found we were at Youliu Line!\\nUgh... My God, why do they have to make the names so complicated?"}

Name: Note Torn off From a Diary
Title: Note Torn off From a Diary
SubContent: {1: "DD MM\\nI haven't done any ground missions for a long time. After receiving a greeting card, the captain made an exception and applied for a Corrupted elimination mission around here for me.\\nActually, I'm a bit scared. I'm afraid that... the one who sent the card is not there anymore, but I don't want to turn the captain or my Support Force friends who worked hard to find me down.\\nI'm finally here in Kowloong after so many years."}

Name: Archaeological Team's Note
Title: Archaeological Team's Note
SubContent: {1: "\\n...New ruins found again? I'm just two days back from Kowloong.\\nExcavation is fun, but this is too much! All we want is to clear up a conservation area for people to live, right? And that alone made them find different ruins from the strata?\\nKowloong is indeed full of treasures..."}

Name: Archaeological Team's Sticky Note
Title: Archaeological Team's Sticky Note
SubContent: {1: 'The new ruins made us stay for a long time, long enough for the residents on the Nighter to move to Metropolis and start to celebrate their new year on a special day.\\nEveryone of them was welcoming, inviting us to celebrate the holiday with them. We had the food they called "dumplings" and set off simple fireworks and firecrackers with them.\\nAll of them looked happy, wishing one another a happy new year. Even I received several red packets from them. Inside the packets are a currency called "Grubs."\\nIt\'s twelve o\'clock. The old brass bell was rung. They cheered, celebrating the arrival of the new year. Everyone was hugging the strangers around them.\\nMy eyes got wet somehow when I hugged the human next to me.\\nI guess it was probably the magic of Kowloong\'s "new year."'}

Name: A New Year's Card
Title: A New Year's Card
SubContent: {1: "(There are water stains of different sizes on the card.)\\n\\nPlease help us give this card to Lin Xun's commandant.\\nThank you! Thank you so much...\\nWe've never expected to see our child...\\nIt has been decades. Both of us had thought he was dead. We lost all our hope after not receiving any messages from him...\\nThank you! Thank you very much... We couldn't believe our eyes the minute we opened the door and saw him. It's wonderful! Thank you, God! Thank you, Commandant! ...\\nAlthough the new year has probably arrived by the time you receive this card, I still want to wish you a happy new year and all the best!"}

Name: A Wet Note
Title: A Wet Note
SubContent: {1: "\\n...No idea why we are back. Isn't it good just staying on the sea? Just land once in a while and exchange things with people from the strongholds at docks and then move on. How is that homeless? Doesn't everyone have their own room onboard?\\n\\n...I don't wanna come back. I don't like Kowloong. I hate it here.\\n\\nWill the Nighter set off again?"}

Name: A Sticky Note With Scribbles
Title: A Sticky Note With Scribbles
SubContent: {1: "I want to add another bulb to my room. It's too dark. I can't even see my face clearly in the mirror with the current one.\\nBut getting another bulb requires a lot of miles... Let me do a quick calculation here... It's gonna cost almost a quarter of my savings!\\nThe merchant said that this bulb was bright enough to light up every corner of the house. I thought he was lying, but I bought the bulb anyway in the hope that it might work like he said...\\n\\n... **************!!!\\nI'm going... blind!!! *******!!!\\n\\n(The rest is a bunch of swearing words, but the writing is too scribbled to read.)"}

Name: Note Found Among the Supplies for Exchange
Title: Note Found Among the Supplies for Exchange
SubContent: {1: "Our supplies were almost stolen by a bunch of refugees.\\nNot robbed, but stolen. I didn't know how they could be so fast. They acted the minute we got the supplies off, quick and neat. Hadn't I ordered people to watch from the ship, they would have gotten it.\\nThe leader was a kid. All of them were kids. I don't know where they came from. They were skinny, like malnourished carrots.\\nI wrote a report and brought them onto the ship.\\nIt's not a good place, but at least we have some food here."}

Name: Half of a Draft Paper
Title: Half of a Draft Paper
SubContent: {1: "\\nRecently, I can always find stuff like dried mushrooms and strange-flavored c\\nRecently, I can always find stuff like dried mushrooms and strange-flavored cans. Although I don't need them as a Construct, I decided to take them back to my room for the moment.\\n\\nI deliberately stayed awake after the patrol tonight to find who had been leaving those stuff. And it turned out that it was those ans. Although I don't need them as a Construct, I decided to take them back to my room for the moment.\\n\\nI deliberately stayed awake after the patrol tonight to find who had been leaving those stuff. And it turned out that it was those malnourished carrots.\\n\\nI dragged them into my room and told them I didn't need those stuff. They nodded as if they understood, finished the food quickly, and left quietly."}

Name: Kowloong Nighter Docking Records
Title: Kowloong Nighter Docking Records
SubTitle: {1: '[Kowloong Nighter Docking Records: Local Records]'}
SubContent: {1: "I have to record this historic moment.\\nAfter drifting on the sea... for so long,\\nwe are finally... back home!\\nEveryone is on the deck, staring at the shore that got closer and closer to us. We know that it's Kowloong. It's... our home.\\nThe mist is gone. Kowloong is still there surrounded by mountains. The city is seriously damaged, but I can still recognize the buildings...\\nI'm... finally back. Are you... still doing okay...?\\n\\n(There are some water stains at the bottom.)"}

Name: Paper With Random Notes
Title: Paper With Random Notes
SubContent: {1: "Why are there so many research centers around here? Is it because this place is hard to find? Or because it's relatively more stable due to the cold weather? Three abandoned research centers in twenty miles. All under the ground.\\nAren't they afraid of... digging into another research center by accident? I heard that the two groups of explorers working separately on two research centers started to dig immediately when they heard noises from the other side, thinking there was a secret room. They met after digging less than five meters.\\nI don't know if there's any truth to this rumor, but... What was that? Did something collapse? I'll be right there!"}

Name: Small Note Between the Pages of the Trade Report
Title: Small Note Between the Pages of the Trade Report
SubContent: {1: "\\n...What the hell? Turns out there is a market for the heavy clothes! What are the buyers thinking? Do people outside the snowfield really need them?\\n\\nLet me have a look at the comments...\\n\\nWarm quilt with sleeves? Perfect for winter night patrols? Mom's legs don't ache anymore during cold days?\\n\\nWhat are these...? Forget it. Let's keep this production line next year..."}

Name: Arctic Route Union Quarterly Trade List 1
Title: Arctic Route Union Quarterly Trade List 1
SubTitle: {1: '[Arctic Route Union: Quarterly Trade List]', 2: "Approver's Comment"}
SubContent: {1: "...\\nWe've prepared a lot of fish, pine needle tea, nuts, and other foods. The trade squad is leaving in two days.\\nWe plan to get some fruits and vegetables that are easy to preserve. We also need a batch of parts. The list is attached below. Please make sure you get everything ready.\\nMeanwhile, we plan to make some padded coats to open a new market.\\n\\n", 2: 'Are you an idiot? You think every place is as cold as the Arctic Route Union out there? Who are you going to sell the padded coats to? Those who live in the equatorial region?'}

Name: Torn Sticky Note
Title: Torn Sticky Note
SubContent: {1: "Damn! Those Corrupted attacked another cargo crew! What the hell are they up to?\\nFortunately, there are no injuries, but we have to send people to recycle the supplies... Why do they have to make a mess every time?\\nThe other two cargo crews will be on the way back tonight. Hope they won't bump into the Corrupted."}

Name: Sticky Note Left in the Supply Box
Title: Sticky Note Left in the Supply Box
SubContent: {1: "Our newly constructed station was destroyed by the Corrupted again, along with fringes of the bases near the station. Ugh, I hate it. Now I have to write a report to apply for restoration budget again.\\nIt's always like this. We just build a building and the Corrupted is there to destroy it, making it looks like as if we are playing some tricks to get more restoration budget. Are the Corrupted doing it deliberately?\\nSigh...\\nWith that said, I have to write a report again.\\nHope the Corrupted would skip this station. I can stop having mushrooms for three month if my wish could be granted..."}

Name: Note With the Mark of Babylonia
Title: Note With the Mark of Babylonia
SubContent: {1: "\\nMy impression on those Asslam guys has been renewed.\\n\\nI thought that they were nothing but a bunch of bumpkins, but that big guy they sent for the military exchange was surprisingly flexible and able to master skills that I haven't managed to do even though he looked dump and drove an obsolete vehicle.\\n\\nHmm... I guess I'll invite them for a drink at night before the exchange is over."}

Name: Babylonia Exchange Record 2
Title: Babylonia Exchange Record 2
SubTitle: {1: '[Babylonia Exchange Record]', 2: '[Content]'}
SubContent: {1: 'Reporter: Akdilek Soldier\\n', 2: "W-why the hell does a rough guy like me I have to write this? What? I'm the only one signed up for the competition? ****! That's because I'm the only one who took the train driving course among all the people across these carriages!\\n****, I don't want to write this damn thing at all, but that solo vehicle the Babylonia guys drove looks so elegant! It goes fast and carries supplies. If we had it, little Ryan wouldn't have... ****, we agreed not to talk about this.\\nCaptain, when can we get a batch of those vehicles?"}

Name: Demolition Notice
Title: Demolition Notice
SubContent: {1: 'Please note that the building will be torn off in two days due to its severely damaged walls. Residents in this building, please move to the designated location as soon as possible.\\nNote: In case you have any trouble moving out or lack daily necessities, you can register your needs with the conservation area staff to claim them later when the supplies arrive.\\n\\n(The handwriting on the note is a bit scribbled, but there is a well-drawn roadmap attached underneath with temporary settlements and supply registration spots marked out.)'}

Name: Well-preserved Paper
Title: Well-preserved Paper
SubContent: {1: "Mom is sick. She looks bad with her pale face and eyes closed.\\nThe sister from the conservation area said there would be medicines very soon. She is good. She gave me candies, so I believed her.\\nIt's dark again. The earthquake came again.\\nBut I'm not scared, because Mom said that the earthquake couldn't crush our seeds, our land, or our backs.\\nAs long as we have the seeds and land, we can continue to live on this land..."}

Name: A Page Torn off From an Old Book
Title: A Page Torn off From an Old Book
SubContent: {1: '\\nThis is the best time, the time of wisdom, the time of light, the time of hope, and the time that we advance to the universe. This is—the Golden Age.\\n\\nEden Babylonia II is under construction. Standing on the top of Earth, humanity has seen the vast starry sky and the magnificent Milky Way.\\n\\nWe are standing on the threshold of a new era...'}

Name: Half of a Manuscript Paper
Title: Half of a Manuscript Paper
SubContent: {1: "Pay attention, buddy. Go back to your tent when it gets dark.\\nDon't trust anyone except your mom, dad, and conservation area staff in their costumes.\\nIf you can stay in your tent in the conservation area after it gets dark, you can come to me, your lovely doctor, for a candy!\\n\\n(The other half seems to have been torn off.)"}

Name: A Well-preserved Sticky Note
Title: A Well-preserved Sticky Note
SubContent: {1: "...Everything is fine. I've arrived at the destination safely... Ugh...\\nThe escort Construct is nice, not as scary as they said...\\nIt's just... It's just...\\nBlargh... Can we not force landing next time? Or drive the vehicle a bit slower...?\\nI'm not criticizing. I'm just giving a suggestion. I'm overall satisfied with it...\\nReview: ☆☆☆☆☆"}

Name: A Folded Note
Title: A Folded Note
SubContent: {1: "I asked someone to bring this note to Babylonia. Please hand it to Gray Raven Commandant. Thank you!\\n\\n...\\nThis is an official thank-you letter. Thank you, Gray Raven Commandant, for not giving up on the elders in the Copperfield Aquarium. My... My father was among them. After my mother passed away, he didn't hesitate to...\\nSorry, it's not the time to talk about it. Anyway, thank you, Gray Raven Commandant, although we've never met. I took my father back to the conservation area and found a transport job that's enough to support the two of us!\\nPromise me to drop by and have a dinner with us if we could meet in the future. My father is good at making cheese pies. We are living in Conservation Area 015. My name is Anzi...\\n\\n(It seems the writer's pen is out of ink. The remaining handwriting is blurry.)"}

Name: A Notice Stripped From Somewhere
Title: A Notice Stripped From Somewhere
SubContent: {1: '(The following text seems to have been altered by someone with two big crosses.)\\n\\nPlease note that some defector Construct seems to have run into the conservation area. If you spot him, please report to the staff of the conservation area immediately.\\nThe Construct could be aggressive, so please keep away from him.\\n\\n\\n(There is a line of text written by a child.)\\n\\nScott is not a bad guy!'}

Name: Scrap of Paper With Vital Fluid
Title: Scrap of Paper With Vital Fluid
SubContent: {1: '...I escaped at last.\\nI hate that place.\\nAll the lies, the betrayals, the escapes... Is this the place that I sacrificed everything to get in? Is this... the life I want?\\nI... got out.\\nHope the two Constructs I hit are doing fine.\\nBut I had no choice. I...\\nI hate that place.'}

Name: Sticky Note Between the Report Pages
Title: Sticky Note Between the Report Pages
SubContent: {1: "\\nDamn, Captain Karenina is off with people to tear down old buildings again.\\nDo I really fit for the Engineering Force? I love repairing machines but...\\nAhhh! That's scary!\\nBut I'm really afraid of the sound of explosives going off!I'm going deaf—!\\nSo close like always—!\\nWahhh... I wanna go back to Babylonia..."}

Name: Short Sticky Note 1
Title: Short Sticky Note 1
SubContent: {1: "\\nWe ran into a wedding of two wanderers.\\nThere was no church or costumes. Everybody was just sitting around the campfire, blessing the couple.\\nWe didn't want to bother them at first, but a bunch of Corrupted was attracted perhaps by the campfire or the group of wanderers. We went to support them immediately, but...\\nfailed to avoid the tragedy.\\n\\n(The other half of the note is stained with some blood and vital fluid.)"}

Name: Short Sticky Note 2
Title: Short Sticky Note 2
SubContent: {1: '(There is a white petal with blood stuck to the corner of the note, seemingly to commemorate something.)\\n\\nWe helped them bury the old man who had trouble walking and failed to escape.\\nThey gathered together and sang a long sad song. Then, they thanked us and left in their vehicle.\\nLife goes on no matter what kind of tragedy has taken place on this land.\\nWe hope that new life could be born in despair.'}

Name: A Note With Scribbles
Title: A Note With Scribbles
SubContent: {1: '(On the front it says "Breaking News! Babylonia Secret..." On the back are some scribbles.)\\n\\nWe spotted a strange vehicle with "Stop me for emergency medical help" in various languages printed on each side on our way to provide assistance to another conservation area.\\nThere was only one Construct following it, so we didn\'t check the vehicle. And they didn\'t come down. Seeing we had no intention to go up, they drove off soon later.\\nThis is weird. What the hell is this vehicle?'}

Name: A Blood-stained Bandage
Title: A Blood-stained Bandage
SubContent: {1: "The trench... Such a warm place.\\nThese are probably gonna be my last words. I can feel that my vital fluid is running out at a fast speed. I turned off some pain receptors, but it doesn't help too much... Anyway, now I don't feel anything.\\nThankfully, I'm a Construct, otherwise I might not be able to leave my last words.\\nHope I'm not gonna be an intelligent creature again in my next life. I'd rather be an ant, living a short life...\\n...Wait... What is that? Is it the angel who came to pick me up?"}

Name: A Well-wrapped New Year's Card
Title: A Well-wrapped New Year's Card
SubContent: {1: "\\nIf you can take this card to Babylonia, could you give it to a young man called Lin Xun? He is our son. When Kowloong fell, we escaped on the Nighter and lost contact with him before saying goodbye to him...\\n\\nWhen the Nighter landed, we met someone who claimed to be a Support Force member from Babylonia. We weren't very hopeful but still asked him to take the card to Xun.\\n\\nXun, if you a still alive, our current address is... (Below it is a blurry address.)"}

Name: Conservation Area Rescue Report
Title: Conservation Area Rescue Report
SubTitle: {1: '[Conservation Area Emergency Rescue Report]'}
SubContent: {1: "Support Force & Task Force\\nAfter receiving the alarm signal, we've successfully gotten in touch with the conservation area and confirmed that the previous disconnection was caused by the mud flow and the earthquake in some areas.\\n...\\nThe cut-off roads, the delayed medicine supplies and the disasters have led to 7 deaths (including 5 staff in the conservation area) and 4 lightly injured.\\n...\\nThe Central Purification Filter in the conservation area was slightly damaged. The Engineering Force has fixed it with the list of parts and other tools used attached."}

Name: Conservation Area Medical Status Report
Title: Conservation Area Medical Status Report
SubTitle: {1: '[Conservation Area Medical Status Details]'}
SubContent: {1: "Star of Life\\n...\\nThe current conservation area rescue operation has come to an end. The Conservation Area Medical Status Report is generated by conservation area.\\n...\\nIn general, in addition to the medical staff shortage, most conservation areas are still in urgent need of massive human Punishing immune serum, alcohol, nitroglycerin tablets, loratadine tablets, ranitidine, and other supplies listed in the attached document.\\nWe plan to send Star of Life medical staff in batches and perform urgent training for willing residents of the right age to relieve the medical staff's pressure of bandaging the injured.\\nWe've also applied to develop a medical vehicle that can travel around and provide medical treatment to ease the pressure in some conservation areas.\\n..."}

Name: A Crumpled Page of a Diary
Title: A Crumpled Page of a Diary
SubContent: {1: "\\nDD MM\\nI saw a military Construct! It was cool! Can I become an excellent commandant some day, leading these Constructs to work on missions and recapturing Earth?\\nSpeaking of recapturing Earth..., I don't feel anything special about it. After all, I've never been on Earth, not even the conservation area.\\nHow about... Um... I heard that the academy sends out cargo ships regularly... Um... \\nAlas, no, I can't write this down. I have to tear this off before the instructor sees it."}

Name: A Wrinkled Note Torn off From Somewhere
Title: A Wrinkled Note Torn off From Somewhere
SubContent: {1: "\\n****, again.\\nI'm with the Support Force! Not the transport force! I won't do it even if you pay me!\\nDon't put things into my vehicle! Damn it! Get your goat off! It's gonna shit!"}

Name: Words on the Back of a Leaflet
Title: Words on the Back of a Leaflet
SubContent: {1: '\\nI think my impression of those Construct soldiers has changed.\\nAt first, I thought they were arrogant, but looking back, I think they have their reason to be proud. I mean, all of them were city elites.\\nBut hey, last time when I asked them to send a goat to my daughter in the neighboring conservation area, they still delivered it even though they hated it for shitting next to their supply boxes... and they even brought back a letter from my daughter.\\nHope my little granddaughter can make it through this time...'}

Name: Application to Introduce Special Creatures as Vehicles to the Support Force
Title: Application to Introduce Special Creatures as Vehicles to the Support Force
SubTitle: {1: '[Application to Introduce Special Creatures as Vehicles to the Support Force]', 2: '[Reply]'}
SubContent: {1: "...\\nAgain, I'm not joking. The ancient Silk Road is where a great number of camels were used as a means of long-distance transportation. Using them will greatly reduce our energy costs.\\nSome animals possess the exceptional gift of climbing. For example, blue sheep can jump and walk on steep slopes. Compared to them, climbing vehicles require fuel and...\\n...", 2: "...What are you talking about? Won't those crazy bots tear the animals apart?\\nThat said... mimicry vehicles are worth considering.\\n— Bridget"}

Name: An Old Report
Title: An Old Report
SubTitle: {1: '[Death Notice]'}
SubContent: {1: "We regret to inform you that your friend Gerald was killed in the abttle against the Punishing Virus.\\nWe've sent things he left and the will to you according to his will.\\nGerald was an excellent soldier who volunteered to be modified into a Construct and has made great contribution to our battle against the Punishing Virus.\\nPlease accept our deep condolences."}

Name: Babylonia Dossier Record III
Title: Babylonia Dossier Record III
SubTitle: {1: '[File ID: 100254A]'}
SubContent: {1: '[Mechanoid Observations: Weird Mutation of Some Mechanoids]\\n...\\nInfected with the Punishing Virus, some mechanoids have gone through different changes than others. The Science Council named these mechanoids "abnormal mechanoids."\\nUnlike other aggressive "Corrupted", these ones have shown the signs of a faint sense of independent consciousness.\\nGray Raven\'s recent report on graffiti mechanoid codenamed Nozzle based on its memory chip data reveals that obvious abnormalities in the chip appeared after the mechanoid saw some unknown graffiti with new words like "sage," "willpower awakening," and "future" appearing in the system.\\nNozzle has never shown similar signs after the Science Council reset it based on its memory chip. Even if it was infected by the Punishing Virus, it only turned it into a Corrupted.\\n...'}

Name: Babylonia Dossier Record IV
Title: Babylonia Dossier Record IV
SubTitle: {1: '[File ID: 100280A]'}
SubContent: {1: '[Mechanoid Observations: "Auto Mechanoid" Living Underground] \\n...\\nThese small excavator abnormal mechanoids named "Xi" were found by Construct Nanami. Living underground, these mechanoids have formed a basic society by living together, having unique "preferences," and showing signs of "self-consciousness."\\nUnlike the graffiti mechanoid codenamed Nozzle, "Xi" were not infected with the Punishing Virus according to the initial sampling result.\\n...\\nThe Science Council has decided to concentrate on the research on "Xi" through a meeting and the research result will be applied to the experiment of the "Combat Unit Booster"...\\n...'}

Name: Babylonia Dossier Record V
Title: Babylonia Dossier Record V
SubTitle: {1: '[File ID: 100450A]'}
SubContent: {1: '[Mechanoid Observations: Mechanoid Madorea]\\n...\\nMechanoid Madorea was found in a Kurono orphanage. It had been used as the integrated terminal of a secret Kurono experiment with the ability to assist in experiments, observe objects, consolidate data, and so on. Madorea was not recycled however due to unknown reasons after the experiment was terminated.
