It was abandoned along with a bunch of trial Constructs instead in the orphanage.\\nThe mission report submitted by Commandant Vanessa, Construct Vera, and Construct Bambinata shows that Madorea showed abnormal malfunctions not long after the termination of the experiment. Its memory chip data showed that Madorea seemed to have developed a high degree of recognition of the "nanny" or "mother" identity with signs of "preference" in its behaviors, which made it modify the other trial Constructs in the orphanage in the same way.\\nThe Science Council has recycled Madorea\'s memory chip and remaining parts, planning to carry out a preliminary investigation on its abnormal behaviors.\\n...'}

Name: Babylonia Dossier Record VI
Title: Babylonia Dossier Record VI
SubTitle: {1: '[File ID: 100600A]'}
SubContent: {1: '[Mechanoid Observations: Constellia]\\n...\\nConstellia, the new abnormal mechanoid named Cervantes has undoubtedly brought a great challenge to Babylonia.\\nThe Science Council had speculated that there could be some abnormal mechanoids with "wisdom" or "consciousness" on the ground based on the observations on other mechanoids but couldn\'t prove it due to a lack of samples.\\nSince mechanoid Cervantes has already shown signs of independent thinking, we can\'t use "abnormal" to describe him. Therefore, after a brief discussion, we decided to use "awakened machines" to refer to these mechanoids.\\nCervantes left after Constellia was taken over by Babylonia. There are no signs of him contacting Babylonia after that. The Science Council, the World Government Association of Art, and the Engineering Force took over the follow-up matters in Constellia, including resettling the remaining awakened machines and cleaning up other abandoned areas.\\nDuring the process, the Science Council found that the data of some exhibition halls were lost. Perhaps Cervantes deliberately removed them.\\nBut why did he do that? Are there any other things we don\'t know about awakened machines? ...\\n...'}

Name: Archaeological Team Night Talk I
Title: Archaeological Team Night Talk I
SubContent: {1: "\\nAhem, ready? I'm gonna start!\\nOne time, we found a relic from a long, long time ago. We tried to identify its period with simple devices, but strangely, none of them worked! At this critical moment, someone found massive bones through digging. Our Captain had a look and said they were all human leg bones! All well-arranged! I mean, how many people were there?\\nThat night, we sorted out the bones, put them in a tent, and started to dig around, trying to find out which period the relic was from. However, right on that night...\\nHey! Keep the lights on! Who turned the lights off?"}

Name: Archaeological Team Night Talk II
Title: Archaeological Team Night Talk II
SubContent: {1: "No! That's the end of the story! You turned the lights off first!\\nHumph...\\nThen I'll keep going. But don't turn off the lights again!\\nThat night, I stayed right next to that tent, and I kept hearing weird noises from it. I got up and asked the teammate who was on watch about it. She said that she didn't hear anything and that I was probably having an illusion since she didn't hear it even as a Construct.\\nBut I just couldn't sleep because of the strange noises that sounded like as if those leg bones were rubbing one another. I asked the teammate if she heard it again, but she said she didn't hear anything. She was a good person, willing to have a look at the tent with me.\\nAs we approached the tent with lighting tools in our hands, she suddenly got serious too, saying that she also heard strange noises...\\nAhhh!!! Who's that? Who's biting the bones?"}

Name: Archaeological Team Night Talk III
Title: Archaeological Team Night Talk III
SubContent: {1: "\\nHey! Don't scare Dale! She's the storyteller.\\nWhat's next? That's the end. What happened next was I walked into the tent with Dale and found some mice biting those bones. I guess they were just starved. After all, it was winter, and there was nothing for them to eat on the ground.\\nThe mice's nest was right under Dale's tent, and the sound of them biting the bones woke her up...\\nWhat? Ghosts? Well... Speaking of ghosts, I have a funny experience. Do you want to hear about it?"}

Name: Archaeological Team Night Talk IV
Title: Archaeological Team Night Talk IV
SubContent: {1: 'It was not long after I joined the archaeological team. I went to explore a bunker said to hold many Kowloong artworks with Captain. All our previous explorations showed no signs of life in the bunker. I opened the gate and found the workers who took shelter there but ended up dying with the artworks.\\nThe bunker is big, consisting of several warehouses. We split up to explore the warehouses separately. Captain and I were on the same team. While sorting things in the warehouse, I suddenly heard a slight sound of a Kowloong opera.\\nI thought someone turned on a phonograph or something, but the sound seemed both close and distant. I asked if Captain had heard it, but there was no response. I suddenly realized that we got separated.\\nI immediately took out the terminal, trying to contact him. But the signals were poor, and his voice sounded muffled... I raised my voice and asked him where he was. And his voice suddenly came from my back, along with the Kowloong opera...\\n"I\'m... right behind you..."'}

Name: Note Between Pages of the Archaeological Team Report
Title: Note Between Pages of the Archaeological Team Report
SubContent: {1: "\\n...Stop telling that ghost story! We're running out of time! The transport craft is about to land! The artworks need to be archived!\\nThe most horrible ghost story is a pottery shard bag without a number in your hand, isn't it? Yes, I was talking about you! Stop right there!"}

Name: Shop Street Cargo Record
Title: Shop Street Cargo Record
SubTitle: {1: '[Shop Street Cargo Record]'}
SubContent: {1: '...\\n...\\n...\\nNote 1: Why is there a spike in the trade volume of the mango-flavor concoction? I remember there isn\'t any request for it among the event records.\\nNote 2: Got it. I will check if the transactions are real.\\nNote 3: I\'ve checked it. The trade volume doubled due to a sudden increase in demand. The merchants all mentioned a Construct who bought massive mango-flavored products, claiming "it\'s the flavor of the rainforest."\\nNote 4: Construct? Which team?\\nNote 5: No. 21, an elite Construct from Cerberus. We visited the Construct and the mango smell in her room was so strong that made me want to throw up... She said that the description of the mango smell on the screen matched her impression of the rainforest. I didn\'t get it. But her terminal was playing Rainforest Road of the Golden Age, so I supposed she was referring to that documentary...\\nNote 6: ...Fine. Then I\'ll archive it as it is.'}

Name: Note Between the Report Pages
Title: Note Between the Report Pages
SubContent: {1: '\\n(The note with scribbles is tucked in an old report.)\\n\\nI told you that we should set fixed medical areas to avoid losses. Each life lost in this world is a great loss for us. But now? There are just a few medical areas on the ground...\\nWhat I know is that the more people survive, the more hope of victory we have.'}

Name: A Record on the Notebook
Title: A Record on the Notebook
SubContent: {1: '\\nThis is weird. We found a refugee when patrolling around the conservation area. The man was severely injured, but all his wounds well patched. And he looked good. However, we went through all the medical records but failed to find him.\\nWe asked him where he received the healing. He stuttered and told us it was a vehicle full of flowers...\\nA vehicle with flowers healed his wounds? Who could it be...?'}

Name: A Note Stuck on the Back of the Medical Records
Title: A Note Stuck on the Back of the Medical Records
SubContent: {1: '\\nWe found a new purple-haired female Construct around the conservation area. She looked severely injured with a strange team logo that looked like a deer on her terminal. Is there a team with that logo in Babylonia?\\nAfter patching up her wounds, I wanted to bring her into the conservation area, but she left in a hurry claiming that she was on mission.\\nAh, right, she said her name was "Echo"... Do we have a Construct with a name like that?'}

Name: Note in the Pages of the Conservation Area Medical Records
Title: Note in the Pages of the Conservation Area Medical Records
SubContent: {1: "\\n...This is the third person who asked me to treat their cows.\\nI told her that I only treat humans, sometimes Constructs, but not livestock. But the LADY said it's all the same and insisted I should go with her.\\nAll the same?"}

Name: Small Note in the Pages of the Medical Records
Title: Small Note in the Pages of the Medical Records
SubContent: {1: "\\n...What? A thank-you letter? For what?\\n...Because I managed to comfort the patient with a smile and calm the patient down even in an emergency?\\n...Who wrote it? Did the writer leave the terminal number? Hmm... I think I should add him. I think there's something wrong with his visual module. It needs to be repaired..."}

Name: A Sticky Note Left on the Table
Title: A Sticky Note Left on the Table
SubContent: {1: "\\nA portable medical device? That's new. And the application scenario is... human and Construct rescue in the wild? The requirement is to keep the seriously injured alive until the rescue arrives...\\nIn this case, we need a simple oxygen-making plant, hemostats, hmm... and an AED...\\nBut this way the device will be large. How can I make it smaller...?\\nHmm? It's already half past three? Okay. I'll go to bed now."}

Name: Newspaper Clipping Left on the Table
Title: Newspaper Clipping Left on the Table
SubTitle: {1: 'Breaking News! Elder Professor, Lead Developer of the Portable Medical Device, Saved by His Own Invention!'}
SubContent: {1: '...\\nAfter accepting the project, Professor Estine worked overnight several times to design the plan and adjust the machine, which triggered a heart attack. Thanks to the semi-finished portable medical device by her side, her assistant managed to rescue her. The professor is currently resting at Star of Life.\\nDoes that mean that, to some extent, the development of such a device admits of no delay?'}

Name: A Thank-You Letter From the Conservation Area
Title: A Thank-You Letter From the Conservation Area
SubTitle: {1: 'Thank-You Letter'}
SubContent: {1: "I'd like to say thank you to the angel from Star of Life.\\nShe saved me in my most desperate moment.\\nEven in the most critical moment on the battleground, she still managed to take care of me with a smile, which really calmed me down.\\nAh, thank you, angel from Star of Life, for brightening up my life.\\nPlease find my terminal number below. I hope you will receive this message and contact me.\\n—The Construct you saved, Jane"}

Name: Muddy Report
Title: Muddy Report
SubTitle: {1: '[Report Kept by Star of Life]', 2: '[Accident Investigation Report]'}
SubContent: {1: "(On the front is an examination report scribbled by someone. On the back is some unknown dark red liquid.)\\n\\nDD MM\\nDue to the mudflow in the mountains, we lost contact with the vehicle and it was stuck in the mud. The Construct Soldier on the team who went to look for it is still not back.\\nThe patient is in critical condition. I tried my best to bandage him, but I'm not sure how long he can last.\\n\\nDD MM\\nFive days have passed. The Construct Soldier is still not back. The patient can die at any time. But... there's nothing else I can do.\\nI've run out of notebook pages. I have to write these down on the back of the report.\\nAnyone who reads this... No, forget it. Better keep my name a secret...\\n\\n(The name was covered by some stain.)", 2: 'DD MM, mudflow, one survivor, other team doctors with no vital signs.'}

Name: A Record on the Table
Title: A Record on the Table
SubTitle: {1: '[Patient Interview Record]'}
SubContent: {1: "...\\nToday, Mr. Kenzenov refused our contact request again.\\nMr. Kenzenov came across the Corrupted when he was out. He gave up the chance to escape to alert the conservation area and lost his legs. In recognition of his bravery, Babylonia offered to pay his medical bills in full and provide him with the mechanical prosthetics of the latest version.\\nWe've spoken to him multiple times about it, but he was resistant to our offer.\\nEven though he understands how much the prosthetics could help him, he still refuses our proposal. Perhaps we should let the psychological assistance department take over from here.\\n..."}

Name: A Letter From the Conservation Area
Title: A Letter From the Conservation Area
SubTitle: {1: '[External Letter to Star of Life Conservation Area Division]'}
SubContent: {1: "Dear staff member, Greetings!\\nMy name is Kivo Kenzenov. My father is Zeck Kenzenov. Dad got injured and lost his legs, but he got a bravery medal for guarding the conservation area. Mom said it was a medal Dad got with his injury. Will Dad get his legs again if I return the medal?\\nI'm sorry if this is a bit rude, but I don't know how to make Dad happy again. He locks himself up in his room every day and doesn't talk to us much.\\nI wanted to get Dad out and get some sunshine, but he refused. I suddenly realized that I had never seen anyone else without legs in the conservation area... Is that the reason why Dad refused to go out?\\nAnyway, please help me. I don't want Dad to make Mom sad again.\\nYours sincerely, Kivo Kenzenov"}

Name: Medical Inspection Records
Title: Medical Inspection Records
SubTitle: {1: '[Arctic Route Union Medical Inspection Records]', 2: '[Reply]'}
SubContent: {1: "...\\nThis is the fifth day after I received the field medical inspection report of the Arctic Route Union.\\nI've already felt regretted. Sometimes you won't understand it until you actually go there.\\nI don't care about the bad conditions. I've visited the forests and swamps way worse than here. But this is... different.\\nI can't stand that there's no hot water to drink.\\n...", 2: 'Who sent the Kowloong doctors there?'}

Name: A Short Report Note
Title: A Short Report Note
SubContent: {1: 'Among the Hetero-Creatures discovered this time, there are 12 new species. Until now, 86 new Hetero-Creatures have been found.\\nAs speculated by the Science Council, these Hetero-Creatures have shown a certain level of "weathering-like signs," turning into salt-white dust after death. Please find the sample of the investigation report attached and make sure to keep it sealed.\\nI\'ll move on to the unexplored areas ahead.'}

Name: Note Possibly Scribbled by Someone
Title: Note Possibly Scribbled by Someone
SubContent: {1: "\\nx/x\\nThe institute's food is nasty.\\n\\nx/x\\nWhy add the wax gourd to the braised pork?\\n\\nx/x\\nI hate the chicken rice today. Pineapple and chicken simply don't go together. The pineapple is sour.\\n\\nx/x\\n...The Punishing Virus has messed up everything out there. The institute immediately decided to destroy all the robots. However, it was too late. The kitchen robot rushed out with a knife and attacked the cook.\\nNo food for today... I guess."}

Name: Hetero Zone Investigation Meeting Record I
Title: Hetero Zone Investigation Meeting Record I
SubTitle: {1: 'Hetero Zone Investigation Meeting Record (Excerpt)'}
SubContent: {1: '...\\n...Captain questioned if we could trace the source of the Punishing Virus in the bodies of the infected individuals in the Hetero Zone.\\nThe recycling of the remaining Para-Protozoa was carried out on Cerberus\' battlefield during the investigation later. A severely rotten metal bar was found, suspected to belong to someone from the conservation area. If the Para-Protozoa were not made to feed on the victims but to be transported somehow to the center of the Hetero Zone and added to the Red Tide to feed the conservation area... can this be considered as a "reverse feeding" behavior?\\n...'}

Name: Hetero Zone Investigation Meeting Record II
Title: Hetero Zone Investigation Meeting Record II
SubTitle: {1: 'Hetero Zone Investigation Meeting Record (Excerpt)', 2: '[Notes]'}
SubContent: {1: '...\\nWe have another speculation based on the special infection symptoms in the Hetero Zone.\\nWhat if... the infected were not taken by the Para-Protozoa but deteriorated into them...?\\n...', 2: 'The speculation lacks evidence. We need to wait for the result of further investigation.'}

Name: Fort Winter Experiment Report File I
Title: Fort Winter Experiment Report File I
SubTitle: {1: 'Fort Winter Experiment File - M.I.N.D. Group Testing Record XX8798'}
SubContent: {1: '...\\nGroup A Biological Brain Experiment List:\\n■■■■, ■■■■, ■■■■, ■■■■\\n■■■■...\\nGroup B Memory Shell Experiment List:\\n00237-00897\\n33254-33278\\n00178-02971\\nGroup C Memory Shell Experiment List:\\nAC5465\\nVC1120\\nMX3545'}

Name: Fort Winter Experiment Report File II
Title: Fort Winter Experiment Report File II
SubTitle: {1: 'Fort Winter Experiment File - Report File (Part)'}
SubContent: {1: '...\\nLab Report 45551\\n...\\nnamed this symptom as M.I.N.D. deviation, the mismatch of individual Memory, perception of self, and the body with extremely low neural sync rate.\\n94.1% of the subjects showed difficulty in controlling their body when the deviation occurred.\\nMost of them also had symptoms of agitation or depression and a marked increase in the desire to destroy others and themselves.\\n48.12% still experienced memory disorder even after treatment.\\n(The data of the second half of the report were damaged...)\\n\\nLab Report 49012—\\nSubjects created by the replica M.I.N.D. have a shared cognition.\\nWe named it "Shared Memory". It allows them to transmit information and share feelings between one another in a hardly noticeable way.'}

Name: Fort Winter Experiment Report File III
Title: Fort Winter Experiment Report File III
SubTitle: {1: 'Fort Winter Experiment File - Work Log (Part)'}
SubContent: {1: "...\\nWork Log 575446\\n(The work log was created before the Punishing Virus and those experiment reports...)\\nThe regular check is done. We've picked 8 out of the 103 subjects for the next round of cultivation.\\nAmong them, subject CB103 is closest to the target state. Whether this is related to her relationship with ■■■■ remains to be seen in further experiments.\\nCB107 has been confirmed dead after delivery. CB103 showed a high level of concern for the baby and requested to touch it.\\n\\nWork Log 575459\\nAll selected 8 subjects are dead except CB103. Please refer to the attachment for details.\\nWe checked up on CB103 and found she was pregnant. Researcher ■■■■ confessed what he did.\\nProfessor ■■■ believes that this is probably the reason why CB103 is still alive and proposed to let CB103 deliver before participating in the regular experiments again.\\n\\nWork Log 575518\\n(The record here is incomplete...)\\nIf..., CB103 will be our Cthylla and give birth to ■■■.\\nThe success is around the corner..."}

Name: A Thank-You Letter with Small Characters
Title: A Thank-You Letter with Small Characters
SubContent: {1: "\\nAhem, thanks to your quick response, the road is finally fixed.\\nI wonder who's been driving overloaded vehicles on our newly built road. It has been broken several times... Damn it. Can they just please stop doing that? Now the supplies can't come in!\\nUm, this is the reward as promised.\\nBoss said the system is useful..."}

Name: A Worn Paper Blown Here by the Wind
Title: A Worn Paper Blown Here by the Wind
SubContent: {1: "\\nPff!\\nThe weird-looking things appeared again, lurking around Oasis.\\nWhat did those from the above call them? Hetero-Creatures? But those things... Pff! They are not good.\\nMy hands are shaking. Perhaps I'm dying. It's a shame that I'm not at home. But... at least I've killed more of those ugly monsters...\\n...Huh? What is that...? A vehicle...? With flowers? Is it a hallucination?"}

Name: Note Between Pages of an Asset Book
Title: Note Between Pages of an Asset Book
SubContent: {1: "(The note looks dirty with a childish sunflower drawing painted by an unknown liquid on the back.)\\n\\nWhat else... Let me see...\\nHmm... Dahurian angelica. And these hemostatic and inflammatory drugs...\\nTsk. This is a hassle. Had I left with Babylonia back then, I wouldn't have to work on things like this.\\nPsst... Anyway, this is not bad. I'll get off work early and go back to see them."}

Name: A Note Handled by Multiple People
Title: A Note Handled by Multiple People
SubContent: {1: "\\n...I was attacked just when I took out the note. A purple-haired female Construct saved me. I woke up and found I still had the note.\\nPerhaps this is a lucky charm. Take it and pass it on to the others. I hope you can all get blessed.\\n\\n―\\n\\n****, it worked. I have to give it to my goddess and hope she is safe.\\n\\n―\\n\\n...Pass it on.\\n\\n―\\n\\nI'll take care of myself, sister."}

Name: Note Exposed to the WInd and Sunlight
Title: Note Exposed to the WInd and Sunlight
SubContent: {1: '\\n(The note seems to have been exposed to the sun for a long time. The color of the writing is a bit faded.)\\n\\n～In the desert is a lone traveling wolf...～\\n～Without a pack or a sense of direction...～\\n～Tired it may be, there is no stopping now...～\\n～The departing lone wolf has gained the courage to go on...～'}

Name: A Sticky Note on the Table
Title: A Sticky Note on the Table
SubContent: {1: "\\nAbnormal activity of the Corrupted detected along the road from Oasis to the outside. One of us went missing again.\\nDespite Babylonia's timely rescue, we were still late.\\nWe buried him in the graveyard.\\nHope we can bring these guys some good news next time we come here."}

Name: A Carefully Preserved Sticky Note in the Notebook
Title: A Carefully Preserved Sticky Note in the Notebook
SubContent: {1: "Kowloong! A land of magic! I've never seen this dance or heard this music in any other place!\\nI wrote down the lyrics of a piece of music, but I forgot to record it because I was amazed by the dance. I have to record it next time!\\n\\n...\\nPetals fall on pillows light, sweet sleep on a weary night. Fleeting spring blooms evading our grasp.\\nSummer leaves whisper; cicada calls like a raindrop cascade. A lone shadow remains.\\nWings stretching on a southbound journey. Autumn clouds, miles in gold, draping the heavens. Flames of reckless arrogance over veils of solitude.\\nAtop snowy peaks, snow dances as wings unfurl. Eagle soars above frosty mist.\\n..."}

Name: A Small Note in a Letter
Title: A Small Note in a Letter
SubContent: {1: "\\nDear Son Lin Xun,\\nI hope this letter finds you well.\\nIs everything going well?\\nI hope you can receive this letter. Please let us know if you're fine as soon as possible after you receive it. We all miss you very much.\\n—Lin Fu & Lin Mu"}

Name: Paper Left in the Exploration Ruins
Title: Paper Left in the Exploration Ruins
SubContent: {1: "\\n...What? No sugar in the supplies...? I wasn't asking for fruit candies. There's not even white sugar?\\nHey... Why are you staring at me? What? Why do I look disparate?\\nDamn brat, don't you know that human beings need sugar on a regular basis? Without sugar, we could die like rabbits in despair!\\n...Never mind. I'll figure out a way to apply for a taste module for Constructs like you.\\nLife is only perfect with milk tea."}

Name: A Handwritten Exploration Plan
Title: A Handwritten Exploration Plan
SubTitle: {1: '[Exploration Plan]', 2: '[Reply]'}
SubContent: {1: '...\\nTo regulate the exploration work, the exploration technical requirements have been specified as follows:\\n1. The exploration team should be made of one leader from Kowloong and one leader from Babylonia, with a proper number of technicians and surveyors.\\n2. Kowloong and Babylonia should both contribute measuring and recording equipment to the general warehouse. The use of the equipment requires the signatures of both leaders.\\n...', 2: "This is a hassle. I've talked to Babylonia's leader. Our supplies arrive today, and theirs will arrive tomorrow. We'll start digging once we have enough people."}

Name: Kowloong Visit Records
Title: Kowloong Visit Records
SubTitle: {1: "[Records of Kowloong Corp's Visits at Babylonia]"}
SubContent: {1: "...\\nWe visited one of Babylonia's conservation areas. Although some facilities could be deliberately kept in good shape for the inspection, most of the residents looked mentally and physically healthy, supposedly fed on sufficient supplies for at least one to two months.\\n...\\nWe also checked the Central Purification Filter in the conservation area and might approve the collaboration with Babylonia in the future to construct new areas that filter the Punishing Virus through the Central Purification Filter and provide shelter for the homeless Kowloong recently accepted and the residents from the Nighter.\\n..."}

Name: Kowloong Cultural Relic Exploration Records
Title: Kowloong Cultural Relic Exploration Records
SubTitle: {1: '[Kowloong Cultural Relic Exploration Records]'}
SubContent: {1: '...\\nDuring the exploration, we unexpectedly found the hidden ruins under the White Crane Bay Ruins, the target of the exploration. We named the newly found ruins, the "Badao River Ruins" after the Badao River on one side of the ruins.\\nThe eastern part of the Badao River Ruins has 12 excavation grids with 10 of them excavated to the Badao River culture layer. The focus will be on collecting scientific samples from them and carrying out research on the environment.\\nThe Badao River culture layer contains rich well-preserved cultural relics that can efficiently make up for the missing part of Badao River\'s civilization development history...\\n...'}

Name: Note with a Small Panda
Title: Note with a Small Panda
SubContent: {1: "\\nHello, anyone who finds this note, please bring it to the Gray Raven Commandant. Thank you!\\n...\\nCommandant! Hehe, isn't it surprising to receive a note from me?\\nI didn't have the time to contact you because the Nighter has just docked and Kowloong is being constructed. I had a lot of things on my plate. I promise I'll invite you over once Kowloong is fully constructed!"}

Name: A Seemingly Long Letter
Title: A Seemingly Long Letter
SubContent: {1: "\\n(A long letter opened for Babylonia's inspection.)\\n\\nCould you bring this letter to Rosetta if possible?\\nRosetta, this is Lisa. How are you doing? I haven't seen you for a long time ever since you left Babylonia...\\n..."}

Name: Note Between Pages of a Medical Assistance Report
Title: Note Between Pages of a Medical Assistance Report
SubContent: {1: "\\nHiss... This place is too damn cold.\\nBut I can see stars from here. I only volunteered to provide medical assistance because of them.\\nThe stars are beautiful. If I lived in a peaceful time, I would save enough money and travel around the world with my camera, taking photos of them.\\nHehe, I know this is unrealistic, but what we are doing now is for our kids to realize dreams like this in the future, isn't it?"}

Name: A Note Left at the Depot
Title: A Note Left at the Depot
SubContent: {1: "\\nI told you! DO NOT LET HIM COOK! DO NOT LET HIM COOK! But no one listened to me! None of you!\\nThat guy can't even tell a garlic sprout leaf from a Chinese chive leaf! Why did you ask him to cook? What if he accidentally adds Construct oil as cooking oil into your food?\\n****! Now you all have food poisoning! How can I get you back? ****! Damn it! Next time... There is no next time! No more missions with you idiots! ****!"}

Name: Note Found in the Construction Area
Title: Note Found in the Construction Area
SubContent: {1: "\\nThe Arctic Route Union has made my day! I've never fished through a hole in the ice!\\nThe roads were blocked due to the big snow days ago, blocking the construction materials from the outside, so the locals took us to fish. Just throw some crumbs through the holes in the ice and the fish will keep coming out from them!\\nIt's a shame that the construction aid project ended so soon. I'll definitely be the first to sign up if there are any ARU missions in the future!"}

Name: Sticky Note on a Tree Branch
Title: Sticky Note on a Tree Branch
SubContent: {1: "\\n...****\\nWhy the **** am I lost again?\\nWhy does this place look different every after the snow?\\n****. I'm running out of the antifreeze. Am I gonna die in this ******* place with all these construction materials?\\nNo no no. Look on the bright side... Look on the bright side...\\nNow that the signal flare was shot, all I need to do is to make it until daybreak..."}

Name: A Folded Sticky Note
Title: A Folded Sticky Note
SubContent: {1: "\\n(The note has Jamilah's personal stamp on it.)\\n\\nAsslam's train is under reconstruction. Changyu, Sophia, and the others are busy with it. We have to find a chance to let them take a break.\\nThe train will be reconstructed soon or later, right?"}

Name: Note Found in the Train's Waste 1
Title: Note Found in the Train's Waste 1
SubContent: {1: "\\nEverything will be ready after tonight, but we still have to wait.\\nI heard that Ashlar made a new purchase. As for what he bought and the quantity of it, I'll have to wait for my team to come back to find out.\\nI've already waited for a long time. I don't mind to wait for another three days."}

Name: Note Found in the Train's Waste 2
Title: Note Found in the Train's Waste 2
SubContent: {1: "...I still remember the way you sat here.\\nThose days are gone, and I have to stick to the present without you.\\nAt least your son is still alive. I fulfilled my promise to you.\\nYou said that we all needed to have a purpose to prevent the heart from dying before the body.\\n...\\nWatching him growing up day by day, I realize that you've passed away for a long time...\\nJulie, I wished you to be happy than anyone else even though I was the least qualified to say so.\\nI still dreamed about the night you got stabbed from time to time.\\nWould there have been a better way if we could start over?\\nI don't know. I have no right to apologize to you. If you were still here, I hope you could...\\nkill me with your own hands."}

Name: Note Left on the Train
Title: Note Left on the Train
SubContent: {1: "\\nHa, I don't know how they managed to get a batch of wheat juice. I had a sniff. It's made from quality wheat. Things with such quality are hard to come by nowadays. Have to get a drink or two from them tonight.\\nI haven't had drinks like this for centuries.\\nAnyways, things will get better."}

Name: Sticky Note Forgotten in a Corner of the Train Station
Title: Sticky Note Forgotten in a Corner of the Train Station
SubContent: {1: '\\nOn day 3 after entering the ruins near the Asslam Train Station for exploration, I saw the desert sunset.\\nThe magnificent scenery looked just like what a Kowloong poem has described, "A round sun sets in the great desert." I took a shot of it and uploaded it to Babylonia\'s forum through the terminal. A bunch of kids immediately came out and accused me of generating an image using the algorithm, saying it could not be real.\\nBut hey, the algorithm could never capture the true beauty. They just couldn\'t get it.\\nYou have to go there and see it with your own eyes to feel it.\\nThere\'s still a long way before those kids get it.'}

Name: Small Note Between the Pages of the Exchange Report
Title: Small Note Between the Pages of the Exchange Report
SubContent: {1: "\\nI hate working with the ARU guys. They look fierce and arrogant. I don't get it. Yes, the level of the Punishing Virus in the ARU is low, but does it have anything to do with them? That's the earth's credit!\\nStill, I must admit that their down jackets are warm. Put it on in the cold desert, and you'll get warm immediately.\\n...Why are you staring at me? I'm telling you. This is the truth of this world.\\nYou can't ignore a person's disadvantages because of their advantages or deny their advantages because of their disadvantages.\\nAhem, remember this! A new life lesson from old Ryan!"}

Name: A Wish Note Torn in Two
Title: A Wish Note Torn in Two
SubContent: {1: "(The handwriting on the note seems to have been written by a child.)\\n\\nMom, are there stars above the clouds? You said I would see Grandma soon. Is it true?\\nMom, don't cry. I'm already very happy. I even Had the supply can from Babylonia! It was delicious, way better than the rations!\\nMom, can I wear the beautiful dress? The one the Construct sister gave me? She said she brought it here from a faraway place. I liked her bow. She took it down for me to touch it.\\nMom, I want to protect you with a bow like that when I grow up.\\nMom...\\n\\n(The rest of the handwriting is a scribble. It seems the writer was too weak to write.)"}

Name: A Cassette With a Short Recording
Title: A Cassette With a Short Recording
SubContent: {1: "\\n(A short recording)\\n\\n...Is the support here?\\nI've asked for support. They said they already contacted the conservation area nearby and informed Babylonia through something called commission terminal.\\n...Cough.\\nAre you okay? Can you still hold up?\\n...I'm fine. I... Cough... Take care!\\nJerre!\\n\\n(The recording ends here.)"}

Name: A Handwritten Letter With Tear Stains
Title: A Handwritten Letter With Tear Stains
SubContent: {1: "\\nDad, she's gone.\\nI put on the dress the purple-haired Construct gave her.\\nI hope...\\n\\n(The rest is a scribble and unreadable.)"}

Name: A Page Torn Off From a Handwritten Newspaper
Title: A Page Torn Off From a Handwritten Newspaper
SubTitle: {1: '[Great TIme Daily]'}
SubContent: {1: '...\\nJul 13, the contract plan of human experiment on death-row prisoners has been terminated officially.\\nThe plan approved by the World Government has been around for three years. Originally, it was a charity contract signed by the prisoner and their family voluntarily for the prisoner to assist in the medical experiment after receiving compensation.\\nHowever, this year, it was revealed that the related institutes had "borrowed" the prisoners secretly to carry out inhuman experiments in the name of the World Government without their agreement.\\nAfter that, people started a mass protest against the plan. Three days later, the plan was completely halted. Human experiments were once again listed as an illegal operation.\\n...'}

Name: A Note With Mud Splatters
Title: A Note With Mud Splatters
SubContent: {1: "(A Note With Mud Splatters)\\n****, I'm not gonna move! The buildings won't just collapse because she said so! I don't believe that crap! I've been living in this conservation area ever since I moved here. There's no way she could make me move! Who knows what the Babylonia officials are up to?\\n...\\n\\n(Some new handwritings, seemingly to be added not long ago.)\\n...\\n***! It collapsed...\\nCough cough..."}

Name: A Casual Note
Title: A Casual Note
SubContent: {1: "\\nIt's weird. Is this a real commission? I went to the location as required, but there was not any client, nor any commission...\\nUmm... Did the Forsaken find anything?"}

Name: Note Nailed to the Wall
Title: Note Nailed to the Wall
SubContent: {1: "\\nArrgh! I'm exhausted!\\nWhat's happening on the surface? Why are there so many injured Constructs and humans these days? I've been working ten days nonstop! I'm drained. I wanna sleep...\\nCould anyone bring me a cup of Construct coffee electrolyte? Thanks..."}

Name: Note in the Application
Title: Note in the Application
SubContent: {1: "\\nHmm... Conservation Area Reconstruction Progress, Conservation Area Equipment Update Application... Why the hell is the Control Court's equipment update application report here? Who sorted out the files? Why mixing these up together? And even the Star of Life and the Cargo Crew?\\n... What's going on with the Cargo Crew? Application for Simulated Goat Vehicles? They already have the drones! Simulated goats? What are they going to do with them? Eat?\\nPst... Can anyone help them rearrange the files? I don't want to waste my time on these weird applications..."}

Name: Note Next to the Shelf in the Conservation Area
Title: Note Next to the Shelf in the Conservation Area
SubContent: {1: "\\nDamn... It's raining again.\\nI really hate visiting the construction site in the conservation area on rainy days like this. Even Constructs hate the humid air and wet mud!\\nMy joints always get stuck because I didn't have the time for maintenance. Even the tools in the box have gotten rusty...\\nWhen is the sun gonna come out?"}

Name: Note Next to the Commission Terminal
Title: Note Next to the Commission Terminal
SubContent: {1: '\\nUgh... New F.O.S. training commission again? I don\'t wanna deal with those brats again.\\nLast time they kept asking me about "interesting combat missions on the surface." And they even sneak attacked me saying they wanted to test my quick reaction capability? ****! My reaction speed is perfect!\\nScratch that mission! Let the newcomers take care of them! I won\'t do it again!'}

Name: Note on the Desk
Title: Note on the Desk
SubContent: {1: "\\nSorting out the equipment applications and research reports? Don't they think I'm overqualified for this?\\n... It should be fine to put the Control Court's equipment update application and the military's equipment application report together... The Star of Life's equipment research report should be in this module!\\nIs this... the Cargo Crew's equipment research application? Simulated goat? This one is interesting. Put it on the top. Can't wait to see them!\\n...Why sorting out the files? Aren't they all the same?\\nGreat! Job done for today! Let's call it a day!"}

Name: Half Note on the Ground
Title: Half Note on the Ground
SubContent: {1: "\\nI saw Mr. Scott again today! I'm so happy.\\nMr. Scott is so gentle, always be able to handle everything. He made this small refugee camp feel... warm.\\nBut he didn't look happy. Sometimes I would meet him by the creek where we fetch water. He always sighs, staring into the sky. I asked him what was on his mind, but he just shook his head, saying that it was nothing and things would get better.\\nBut what was Mr. Scott worried about?"}

Name: Note on the Fence Around the Camp
Title: Note on the Fence Around the Camp
SubContent: {1: '... Are you sure you wanna tell this Babylonia ghost story at night?\\n—\\nNo problem at all! Go ahead! After all, the target won\'t come out for the moment. Only ghosts would be hanging around like us this late!\\n—\\nAhem, this is a story I saw on the Babylonia Forum...\\nHave you noticed that there are always some weird click sounds coming out from the depth of the squad lounge\'s corridor in deep night?\\nA Construct once sneaked out at night, trying to find the source of the sounds by following them. The second day when his teammates found him, he was already crazy and kept mumbling, "They, they\'re coming!"\\nI wonder what kind of sound could make a Construct so terrified?\\nWait— Did you hear that?\\n"Click, click..."\\n—\\nUghhhh! What is that sound?'}

Name: Journal Paper in the Corner of the Refugee Camp
Title: Journal Paper in the Corner of the Refugee Camp
SubContent: {1: '\\nThe fallen leaves and the cold wind\\nmake it harsh on the ground.\\nWhen the first snowflake comes down,\\nthe moon will be pale and the stars will stay.\\nThey will bring you\\nthe lonely white tree\\nthat will light up\\nthe final journey.\\n\\n(The signature is blurry. It seems to be "Echo.")'}

Name: Note Next to the Conservation Area Maintenance Tools
Title: Note Next to the Conservation Area Maintenance Tools
SubContent: {1: '\\nI\'m dying to reach the ghost stories in the Babylonia Forum... My favorite is the one named "click!" I can\'t wait to see what happens next!\\nThe author must have updated a lot more by the time I finish this job! I might be able to read it all at once! I feel like I work faster even thinking about it!\\nChop chop, I have to finish the regular maintenance fast! I want to know how the story ends!'}

Name: Note Under the Ruins
Title: Note Under the Ruins
SubContent: {1: "\\n... Our house is gone.\\nI knew those guys who claimed to be the Babylonia Engineering Force meant good. Dangerous buildings should be removed.\\nBut no one would want to live in a dilapidated house like that if they had choice...\\nWe've been homeless as far as I can remember, originally with Dad and Mom, and then Dad was gone. Eventually..., I'm the only one left.\\nWhere can I go...? Why was I born to this world? I don't..."}

Name: Note Next to the Collapsed Building
Title: Note Next to the Collapsed Building
SubContent: {1: "\\nWhat's the mission...? Take care of the earthquake ruins?\\nTsk... I hate jobs like this. No regular Babylonia maintenance or similar jobs in other conservation areas?\\n... Other demolishment team members are not here. No one else can do this?\\n... Tsk.\\nI hate it. Demolishing collapsed buildings, digging out dead people from the ruins, and watching their families crying for them.\\n\\nTsk."}

Name: Note Put Neatly on the Table
Title: Note Put Neatly on the Table
SubContent: {1: "\\nDear Sir,\\nI'm one of the residents in the conservation area where you previously carried out the demolishment mission.\\nThank you for digging out my father's bones from the collapsed building and letting him rest in peace.\\nI heard you complaining that you didn't like missions like this, saying that they made you feel like committing a big crime and as if you were a carrion bird that always brings cries everywhere you go...\\nThat's not true.\\nThe ground brought us sorrow and scars, but ruins will also grow beautiful flowers. Your diligent work has helped a lot of people who went missing in the earthquake..., including my father, to find their final peace in the company of their loved ones instead of wandering in the darkness under there...\\n\\n(The second half of the text is unreadable due to tear stains.)"}

Name: Note on the Bulletin Board at the Entrance of the Conservation Area
Title: Note on the Bulletin Board at the Entrance of the Conservation Area
SubContent: {1: "Babylonia is looking for a purple-hair... female Construct?\\nHmm... I've never seen a Construct like that, but I think I've seen a strange armor with weird purple aura... But isn't that my illusion? Or... ghosts?\\nIt's scary! Imagine seeing an armor flying to you from the distance! Even the boldest guy would be scared to death!\\nWhat happened next? Well... I don't remember. I was already back to the conservation area when I woke up, with some food in my backpack... I don't know if it was the armor or some other good guy. Anyway...\\nIf it was this purple-hair female Construct, then perhaps she is not that bad, I guess? Why are they looking for her...?"}

Name: Bulletin Board Next to the Transport Equipment Warehouse
Title: Bulletin Board Next to the Transport Equipment Warehouse
SubContent: {1: "\\nStop! Are you out of your mind? You would get yourselves killed in this weather! Visibility under 200 and thunderstorm warning!\\n... I can't sit there and watch you risking your lives even if it's Babylonia's urgent call. Do you know how much it costs for Babylonia to train a pilot like you?\\nI'm not saying that we're not going. Get off! All of you! This is my old partner. You can't go, but I can.\\nWhy staring at me? Get the supplies in!"}

Name: Note Next to the Central Purification Filter
Title: Note Next to the Central Purification Filter
SubContent: {1: "We've moved to our new house!\\nHahaha, I'm so happy! We finally have our own house! This time, it's not a shabby, old, dilapidated house but a house built by our brothers and sisters in the conservation area with the Engineering Force and Support Force sent specifically by Babylonia!\\nI'm so happy no matter how many times I talk about it!\\nThey said that this conservation area was abandoned because the central purification filter stopped working. The Engineering Force sent people to investigate. The tower was eventually fixed after a long period of investigation.\\nI also want to learn how to fix the tower after settling down!\\nThis way... I can live in this house forever, right?"}

Name: Half Note in the Stronghold Near the Ruins
Title: Half Note in the Stronghold Near the Ruins
SubContent: {1: "\\nHey... Why dragging me into this place?\\nI have no idea about what exploration or ruins you talk about! What are those? I'm just a battle Construct. Why the hell did you get me here? Shouldn't you send me directly back to Babylonia after the battle? What else do you need me to do?\\n... Just slash here? For what...? Hey, what do you want?\\n...\\nWhy are they celebrating? Can anyone tell me? What are they doing...?"}

Name: Note on the Table in the Stronghold Next to the Ruins
Title: Note on the Table in the Stronghold Next to the Ruins
SubContent: {1: "DD MM\\nA quick note. We still have no clue about where the ruins are. Our gut feeling tells us we are close, but we just can't find the ruins.\\nThis is strange.\\nA team member suggested we borrowed a Construct he knew. The Construct is called Honanka. He said that although the Construct didn't have any skills for exploration, he was unbelievably lucky.\\nI didn't buy it, but we've already wasted a whole week here. Perhaps... we could use some luck.\\n\\nDD MM\\n...****, he hit the bricks...! The spot he hit was out of our expectation, but...\\nWhy that spot? It shouldn't be there...!"}

Name: Half Note Next to the Ruins
Title: Half Note Next to the Ruins
SubContent: {1: "What a bad day! Why did the collapse happen when I was down here...? Perhaps it's because it has been raining these days...\\nWill I die under here? It's dark, lack of air, and scary...\\n—\\n... Constructs won't die due to lack of air.\\n—What?! There's another person buried here like me? Hey, my friend over there, are you doing fine?\\n—\\nI'm not gonna die for now.\\n—\\nIt's scary but I feel better now... Don't worry. Our captain will notice that we are missing and come to our rescue!"}

Name: Half Note Next to the Ruins
Title: Half Note Next to the Ruins
SubContent: {1: "\\nWe should have stopped digging in this weather...\\nThe recent abnormal crust activities have already affected the geologic structure in the area. Despite the consolidation, there's still a chance that it would collapse.\\nNow we've got the casualties. One Construct was slightly injured and got out. Two were buried under the mud, not too deep, fortunately...\\nThis damn weather..."}

Name: Note on Asimov's Desk
Title: Note on Asimov's Desk
SubContent: {1: '\\nI suggest all Constructs in Babylonia and scout Constructs in the conservation areas on the surface should go through a simple foreign language training. The following languages are mandatory.\\nWhy? Because I don\'t want any menu, bug report, novel, and drill instructions in any weird language to be submitted to me as "valuable research report."\\nIs that enough?'}

Name: Note Left in the Transport Craft Cabin
Title: Note Left in the Transport Craft Cabin
SubContent: {1: "\\nCough, cough! Do we have to explore this dark, broken-down lab? It feels like some strange test subject would rush out and hit me in the face any minute... Well, that would be scary.\\nLet me have a look what we need to recycle... Samples, paper reports... Note: things with the following strange words should not be taken back to Babylonia... Isn't it the foreign language I learned as minor course? This is... today's menu of the lab?\\n... Did anyone really have the nerves to bring these things back to Babylonia and show it to Mr. Asimov? That was brave."}

Name: Note on the Transport Vehicle
Title: Note on the Transport Vehicle
SubContent: {1: "On my way for the support mission with the exploration supplies, I came across a small refugee settlement that was barely a camp.\\nThere were perhaps five or six of them..., living at the very edge of the central purification filter's range. The Punishing Virus concentration here was not suitable for humans to survive. What did they do to get themselves banished here?\\nI... I started to feel for them, so I left some supplies for them. They asked me to stay, but that night... they surrounded my transport vehicle.\\nHowever, how could they fight a fully armed Construct with their handmade weapons?\\nSigh..."}

Name: Note Folded Into a Heart
Title: Note Folded Into a Heart
SubContent: {1: '\\nAlthough I\'ve got your terminal number, a note in the Golden-Age style like this would be more "romantic." I hope you like it... But actually, it\'s because I have something that I\'m a bit embarrassed to say through the terminal...\\nI\'ll be off for another combat mission in the conservation area. This time... it seems to be trickier. Even the elite squads were out. I don\'t know what will happen this time, but I\'ll fight hard for Earth and for mankind!\\nMay I ask you out for a dinner if... if get back? There\'s a new restaurant behind the shopping street. I think you\'ll like it.'}

Name: Note Nailed to the Wall
Title: Note Nailed to the Wall
SubContent: {1: "\\nKeep an eye on the Construct on bed 52. There's something wrong with her M.I.N.D. We've contacted the Science Council. They'll send people to look at it.\\nThe Construct on bed 36 also needs your attention. Don't let him get out. His knees are not fully repaired. It would kill him if we let him working on any mission.\\nThe others don't need much of your attention. I'll give you further instructions after I wake up."}

Name: Paper With Vital Fluid Stains in the Trench
Title: Paper With Vital Fluid Stains in the Trench
SubContent: {1: "\\nDon't worry. Things will get better. You'll return to Babylonia safe and sound... How much backup vital fluid do you have left? Keep notes of it. I will apply for a supply replenishment...\\nDon't worry. The commandant has arrived. The battle will end soon. Everyone will be back to Babylonia safely and see who they want to see...\\nYou're patched. Good to go. Where is the next one?"}

Name: Note in the Trench Next to the Conservation Area
Title: Note in the Trench Next to the Conservation Area
SubContent: {1: "\\nPhew... We had far less human casualties this time. Hm? It's because of the portable medical device?\\nWe have to thank Professor Estin, otherwise, we wouldn't have the device so fast.\\nDon't forget to thank her in the report. Nowadays, the more people we save, the more hope we have.\\nWho knows if the kid we saved will grow up to be a great commandant or not?"}

Name: Scrap Paper on the Transport Vehicle
Title: Scrap Paper on the Transport Vehicle
SubContent: {1: "(A simple lucky charm with a few lines on the back.)\\n\\nI made you a new coat, but it still needs two buttons. Bring two buttons back if you come across any when you're out searching for supplies. It's okay if you can't find any. I can make two buttons with wood.\\nYou didn't have the chance to wear new clothes during the New Year's Day holiday. Now it's the time to make up for it...\\nNow, take this lucky charm with you. Look at it when you miss me. I'll be waiting for you at Oasis."}

Name: Note in the Abandoned Stronghold Near Oasis
Title: Note in the Abandoned Stronghold Near Oasis
SubContent: {1: "\\nUm... What is this...?\\nWhy am I here...? Wait. My supplies...\\nIt's weird. All my supplies are here. Who saved me...? These are... flowers?\\nYes, I got sneak attacked by the Corrupted when I was out looking for supplies. The last thing I saw was... a car covered with flowers... and... Symphony?\\nWho was calling Symphony? Who's Symphony?\\nI can't remember... Let's get back to Oasis first..."}

Name: Note at the Entrance to the Stronghold Next to Oasis
Title: Note at the Entrance to the Stronghold Next to Oasis
SubContent: {1: "A man who claimed to be a bard came to Oasis, mumbling weird things with his instrument. He would work when asked to, but once he is free, he would sit next to the camp, humming while playing his instrument.\\nI heard him singing something... that was not exactly songs. He said they were poems, but I think they were just tunes. Some were bullshit. Some... sounded nice.\\nHe sang that we should not glorify suffering or believe that it will be worthwhile. Life is bitter, but that is not the reason to sing that song. Life should be bright...\\nThat's right... Who would want this kind of life if the world hadn't made us to...?\\nAhem, that was off topic. His instrument is out of tune. I need to find a good piece of wood to fix it."}

Name: Note Blown to the Abandoned Stronghold by Wind
Title: Note Blown to the Abandoned Stronghold by Wind
SubContent: {1: '\\nRescued Today: 1/3.\\nWhy do we have to save three people every day...? Many were injured nowadays, but most of them went to Babylonia. It\'s hard to find anyone on the surface! Even if we had "emergency doctors can stop" on the vehicle, few would stop it. It\'s not like I can turn bones into people or purify the Corrupted back to Constructs to make up for the number!\\n... Alright, alright, I know. Stop complaining... Hey, don\'t touch it! It\'s hard to keep it alive! I\'m gonna put it on top of my vehicle!'}

Name: Note in the Igloo
Title: Note in the Igloo
SubContent: {1: "\\nPhew... We can finally have some rest. Fortunately, we built the igloo fast enough to keep the warmth, otherwise it would be hard to keep him alive in this weather.\\nNow, we just have to wait for the snow to stop... Can we have a chat, Miss Forest Guard? Well... It's mainly because I'm not used to the quietness.\\nI see. The snow has absorbed the sound. You're quite knowledgeable, Miss Forest Guard... Me? I grew up by the sea...\\n\\n(The rest has been blurred by water stains and is unreadable.)"}

Name: Note Found Near the Port
Title: Note Found Near the Port
SubContent: {1: "\\nThe road condition here is complicated.\\nLast time the rescue for a small collapse ended up being delayed for five hours due to the lack of roads, the frozen sea, and drones held off by the big snow. Had it not been the Babylonia and Constructs' timely help, our two teammates would have died under the ruins.\\nBut... building the roads is gonna cost a lot of money. The Arctic Route Union won't be able to afford it.\\nIs there any other way to do it...?"}

Name: Drone Take-off Test Logs
Title: Drone Take-off Test Logs
SubContent: {1: "(It seems to be written by a kid.)\\n\\nDrone take-off test one—\\nNo, no, this won't work. The carrying capacity is too low. The drone can't even carry the lightest transport box.\\n\\nDrone take-off test two—\\n... Failed again. The two should keep the same distance so that the box won't fall over. What if I reinforce the blades...\\n\\nDrone take-off test three—\\nIt didn't work... When am I gonna fulfill my promise and fly my sister to Kowloong with the drone if I keep failing like this...?"}

Name: Note Next to the New Arctic Settlement
Title: Note Next to the New Arctic Settlement
SubContent: {1: "\\nLet's make the new settlement... closer to New Murmansk.\\nWell, it's not like we want to take advantage of it... Or you could say it is one of the reasons. But don't you think our previous settlements were too scattered?\\nIt would be fine before the outbreak of the Punishing Virus. The flights were normal. The ports were normal. We could only be affected by the weather. But now...\\n\\n(The rest was covered by mud.)"}

Name: Half Note on the Train
Title: Half Note on the Train
SubContent: {1: "\\nPhew! The Corrupted were hard to deal with.\\nNow this train station has been cleaned up as well!\\nChangyu and the others have been working hard out there to restart the train. We should also keep going and clean up the stations ASAP, so the train can operate once it gets restarted.\\nAlright, enough rest! Let's move onto the next station!"}

Name: Half Note in the Corner of the Abandoned Train
Title: Half Note in the Corner of the Abandoned Train
SubContent: {1: '\\nThe train will pass through Kowloong today... Have you been there?\\nI\'ve only seen it from a distance through the window. It looked like a huge hemisphere. It was beautiful. I could see buildings in it, buildings I had never seen...\\nMom said those were traditional Kowloong buildings. I wonder what the "traditional buildings" of our train look like. Do they look like... trains like this?'}

Name: Note in the Corner of the Station
Title: Note in the Corner of the Station
SubContent: {1: "\\nI saw a dead little kitten around the station. I wasn't sure if it was starved or attacked by another animal. It looked terrible with its fur clumped together and body covered with mud.\\nI didn't have other bags with me, so I gave it a quick wash and decided to bury it at the station. I believe there will be flowers where it's buried next year...\\nWait. Is it still breathing?"}

Name: Paper in the Corner of the New Station
Title: Paper in the Corner of the New Station
SubContent: {1: "\\nThe new station has been finally constructed right next to the conservation area. It's the first station built after the war. Even Queen Jamilah was here to celebrate on its day of completion.\\nMira picked up a dead kitten next to the station when it's still under construction. Life had gotten better, so no one wanted to eat it. There was no opposition when Mira suggested to bury it. She washed it with warm water, and that cat was alive again.\\nMira was planning to name it White, but Queen Jamilah stopped her and named it Best, and the station was named Best Station.\\nHope... Best can will bring good luck to us in the future."}

Name: Ten Mysteries of F.O.S. I
Title: Ten Mysteries of F.O.S. I
SubContent: {1: 'What?! You\'ve never heard of the ten mysteries of F.O.S.?\\nNo, no, no. They are not just simple ghost stories. Many have experienced at least one or two of them! You are not a F.O.S. student if you haven\'t heard of or encountered any of them!\\nI had experience with the seventh mystery — "gunshots in the simulation training room at two a.m.!" That day I was analyzing our previous tactics in the self-study room and lost track of time. It was already the early morning when I finished. And I was the only one left there! In the fear of missing out on the class at 8 o\'clock, I took the shortcut back to the dorm to save time. And that shortcut is right next to the simulation training room that no one has been in!\\nThe lights were all out and the simulated weather was somehow cloudy. I rushed to the dorm with the light of the terminal. The minute I got close to that training room, I heard—"Bang!" "Bang!" It was the gunshots!\\nBut... the training room should be closed at 11 o\'clock. Even the teacher in charge of it is not allowed to get in! Then... who was training in it...?'}

Name: A Scribbled Report
Title: A Scribbled Report
SubTitle: {1: "[About Dark Aries' Transfer Order]"}
SubContent: {1: "...\\nConsidering that Dark Aries is now out of the suspension period, after the Science Council and the Star of Life's examination, Construct Noan's frame has been confirmed normal. Therefore, the military has decided to lift some of the bans on Noan, allowing him to return to Dark Aries to work on missions.\\nNow Dark Aries has been authorized to execute some underground missions and dispatched to garrison the clean zone, but they are not allowed to participate in eliminating the Hetero-Creatures outside the area.\\n..."}

Name: Unsorted Visit Records
Title: Unsorted Visit Records
Editor: I'll just write some random stuff here.
SubTitle: {1: "[Purifying Force's Random Visit Notes]"}
SubContent: {1: "DD MM\\nA: Do we have to include the exact time? We could get ourselves exposed easily.\\nB: ... Just do it.\\nA: What? I can't even explain about it...? Ahem, the Purifying Force's Xth investigation feedback recording starts now.\\nA: Have you seen a purple-hair um... female with Construct features recently?\\nC: ... The Purifying Force? I didn't do anything! I've been managing my own business recently! I...\\nB: Nothing helpful. Let's move.\\n\\n(The date of this report is covered by something weird.)\\nD: ... A purple-hair Construct? No Constructs would come to this place. It's in the middle of nowhere... Wait, is this a fraud?\\nB: ...\\nA: Who would commit fraud as this God damn squad?\\n\\n(This one doesn't have a date at all.)\\nE: ... What are you doing?\\nA: We are catching... Wahhh...\\nB: Routine inquiry. It's about our fellow colleague who went missing in our previous battle.\\nE: I see... I saw her in a more distant conservation area before. She was patching up someone. But I've never seen her since then.\\n..."}

Name: Support Force Mission Notes I
Title: Support Force Mission Notes I
SubTitle: {2: '[List]', 3: '[Comment]'}
SubContent: {1: 'DD MM', 2: "Emergency Food ×10 boxes\\nEmergency Medical Kit ×10 boxes\\nRepair Tools x10 sets (Please give us at least one set if you're short of supplies.)\\nA batch of building maintenance materials (See details below)", 3: "... Ten sets of maintenance tools? But you only have two workers, right? What are the other eight sets for? Decoration?\\nOnly one set. That's it.\\nFood and emergency medical kits are ready to go. They'll be sent right away."}

Name: Constellia Reconstruction Report
Title: Constellia Reconstruction Report
SubTitle: {1: "[Constellia Reconstruction Report: Ayla's Monthly Report]"}
SubContent: {1: "Hi! This is Ayla. Constellia's reconstruction is going well. I'd like to thank the commandant and Constructs who accepted our commission and came here to help. Without them, we could have missed the deadline.\\nWe've made a list of supplies for the next month and attached it to this report. Please deliver them once the list is approved.\\n...\\n\\n(There's a note in the report.)\\nPlease give the note to Sica. I know she's been learning how to manage the WGAA stuff from Leonie, but it won't kill her to just check her terminal mailbox.\\nPlease tell her that I've got news about Lena and ask her to contact me ASAP when she sees the note.\\n..."}

Name: A Report in a Strange Language
Title: A Report in a Strange Language
SubTitle: {1: '[Research Report of the Abandoned Conservation Area Research Center]', 2: '[Comment]'}
SubContent: {1: "...\\nApologize for the lengthy title, but it seems this is the best way to put it.\\nAhem, I feel honored to submit this report to the noble Mr. Asimov of the Science Council. After receiving Mr. Asimov's request, we immediately sent people to the abandoned research center nearby.\\nOur careful exploration has revealed the following research material written in a language that we don't understand. I think it must contain something deep that only Mr. Asimov can decipher...\\n...", 2: "...What do you want me to do with the research center's recipe?\\nCould you please find a researcher who speaks other foreign languages to review everything before submitting it to me next time?"}

Name: Surface Supply Recycle Report
Title: Surface Supply Recycle Report
SubTitle: {1: '[Surface Supply Recycle Report]', 2: '[Comment]'}
SubContent: {1: '...\\nDuring this battle, we expected to recycle 21 types of supplies in a total of 63 boxes. Among them, 5 boxes were damaged by the Corrupted, 3 were lost due to mistake during the battle, and 2 went bad and were discarded right away due to weather, transportation, and other causes.\\n...', 2: "So we only lost less than one-fifth of the supplies this time... Good. Let's take all their wide-range explosive weapons next time before operation as well. Otherwise, they would ruin at least half of the supplies recovered..."}

Name: Surface Squad Battle Support Report I
Title: Surface Squad Battle Support Report I
SubTitle: {1: '[Surface Squad Battle Support Report]', 2: '[Comment]'}
SubContent: {1: "...\\nWhy still handwriting a report when you can quick generate one through the terminal...? Gestalt will tell Celica? Fine, forget it.\\nHmm, what else should I include...?\\nThe purpose of the battle is to assist the Support Force in rescuing a batch of supplies and a group of residents moving to the conservation area. The conservation area will give you the exact number. I'll skip it here.\\nOh, by the way, among the residents, there is a little girl saved by Enka. She's been looking at Enka all the time hahaha! (The rest has been scratched.)", 2: "Peggy, this is too much crap. I've deducted your vacation."}

Name: Conservation Area Central Purification Filter Maintenance Record I
Title: Conservation Area Central Purification Filter Maintenance Record I
SubTitle: {1: '[Conservation Area Central Purification Filter Maintenance Record I]', 2: '[Comment]'}
SubContent: {1: "...\\nI found the reason why the central purification filter couldn't be fixed. It was the commutator. A mica plate stuck out from it.\\nDespite the advanced machines we have nowadays, delicate stuff like this can still be polished and reprocessed by hand.\\nHowever, we should be able to restart the central purification filter now.\\nI love this job. It gives me the feeling of being a pioneer in a Golden-Age simulation game, bringing humanity back home little by little.\\n...", 2: 'Good job. Come back and have some rest.'}

Name: Ruins Exploration Accident: Collapse Report of the Area
Title: Ruins Exploration Accident: Collapse Report of the Area
SubTitle: {1: '[Ruins Exploration Accident: Collapse Report of the xx Area]', 2: '[Comment]'}
SubContent: {1: '...\\nThe long rain and the recent abnormal ground movements have changed the geologic structure. The squad carried out the mission without careful examination, which led to a collapse that got one Construct Soldier slightly injured and two other Construct Soldiers buried in the outer layer of the ruins. After four hours of rescue, two Construct Soldiers were saved.\\nThe cause of the accident is the execution of the exploration mission without considering the actual geological conditions. Although there are no casualties, we still need to learn our lesson from it.\\n...', 2: "Be more careful in the future. Explorations should only be carried out when it's safe..."}

Name: Accident Analysis Report Received by the Science Council
Title: Accident Analysis Report Received by the Science Council
SubTitle: {1: '[Abnormal Research Center Equipment Investigation Report]', 2: '[Notes]'}
SubContent: {1: '...\\nBased on the abnormal data detected, we immediately sent people to the equipment area on the surface. After exploration, we found no Punishing Virus in the area and ruled out the possibility of the Corrupted causing the abnormal data.\\nWe took a closer look at the equipment and found that the small animals looking for food in the area triggered the frequent sending of abnormal data.\\nWe left two drones to fly up and drive animals away once they detect them...', 2: 'Send an application to make some CUBs to chase away small animals to prevent this from happening again.'}

Name: Surface Research Center Supply Transportation Route Guide
Title: Surface Research Center Supply Transportation Route Guide
SubTitle: {1: '[Supply Transportation Route Guide]'}
SubContent: {1: "So you're heading to this research center on the surface... Then avoid where I put the marks.\\nJust take the main road we previously constructed, and turn this way. The location with the triangle mark on this side has a swamp. Don't fall in there. On this side is a farmland the residents have just reclaimed. Don't go there. Besides, there are several areas where you could encounter landslides or mudslides. So don't go there on rainy days.\\n... Why triangles in these places?\\n... It doesn't matter. Just don't go there. Don't believe anyone in these areas. Sometimes people are more dangerous than swamps."}

Name: Transfer Record of the Forsaken
Title: Transfer Record of the Forsaken
SubTitle: {1: '[Transfer Record of the Forsaken]'}
SubContent: {1: "The first group of the injured have been transported. The new base is safe with medical staff who arrived earlier. All the injured have been taken care of.\\nCalculation done for the second group of the injured. They will be transported when the vehicles are back.\\nUm... the only emergency? There's an old woman who somehow came to the new base by walking with the transport vehicle. She held two wood buttons in her hand, saying that she had to find her son.\\nWe didn't find the young man she said with the name she provided. We wanted to send her back to Oasis with the returning vehicles, but she refused. She looked pretty sure that her child was here...\\n..."}

Name: Combat Support Record at the Arctic Route Union I
Title: Combat Support Record at the Arctic Route Union I
SubTitle: {1: '[Combat Support Record at the Arctic Route Union: MM]'}
SubContent: {1: "Um... It turns out the extreme coldness at the Arctic Route Union is just a stereotype. It is cold here, but their down jackets are really warm, even warmer than the combat uniforms. No matter how advanced the technology is, it can't beat good materials...\\nThey also have pine needle tea. Every after a battle, the forest guards will brew a warm pot of it in the early morning of a big snow. The the smoke makes me want to write a poem, even if I'm not a poet.\\n..."}

Name: Report of Babylonia's Visit to Akdilek
Title: Report of Babylonia's Visit to Akdilek
SubTitle: {1: "[Report of Babylonia's Visit to Akdilek]"}
SubContent: {1: "...\\nAsslam is still under maintenance. Most residents on it have been temporarily resettled in the base in the area.\\nSome Asslam soldiers have been working on escort and transport missions from various factions under the leadership of Changyu to cover Asslam's maintenance cost. The rest of them are recovering the train station damaged in the battle.\\nQueen Jamilah received the delegates and expressed her gratitude to Babylonia. Being able to send commissions directly to Babylonia is very helpful for them...\\n..."}

Name: Fish and Light
Title: Fish and Light
SubContent: {1: "(A note with pine needle aroma)\\n\\nHow have you been lately? We've been doing well? Do you have enough space for running? I know you should be doing fine, but I still miss the time when we ran in the forests and drank the hot pine needle tea around the campfire.\\nI've caught a lot of fish in the ice lake. It's a shame that we are too far apart and I can't share them with you. I attached a picture of the fish we caught to share the joy with you.\\nHmm, what else do I want to say...?\\nIt's been peaceful recently. Standing in the forest and watching over the light on the fishing boats every day calm the mind. Days like this are not bad.\\n..."}

Name: A Neatly Written Note
Title: A Neatly Written Note
SubContent: {1: "Simple Accounts of Today\\n\\nIncome:\\n1. Remuneration for assisting Babylonia in transport preparation: xxxx\\n2. Remuneration for dispatching some Akdilek Cargo Crew members to be in charge of the security of Babylonia's conservation area: xxxx\\n\\nExpense:\\n1. Cost for sending a commission to request for Babylonia's assistance in constructing a base along the railway: xxxxx\\n\\n(Hmm... Doesn't feel like it's a good deal.)"}

Name: Old Sticky Note With Cloud of Good Fortune Patterns
Title: Old Sticky Note With Cloud of Good Fortune Patterns
SubContent: {1: "Behind Kowloong is the sea. Then, what's behind the sea...?\\nMom said it was the end of the world where you could see the start and end of everything in history.\\nI'm not interested in those things... I just want to see Grandpa there. I haven't seen him for a long time.\\nMom said if I put the note here, the wind would bring it to a place without the Punishing Virus for Grandpa to see it.\\nI miss you so bad, Grandpa."}

Name: A Small Note on the Transport Vehicle
Title: A Small Note on the Transport Vehicle
SubContent: {1: "\\nTeammate's betrayal made me hit the rock bottom. Wandering around on the doomsday wasteland, I will make a comeback as a legendary commandant! Send me Black Card x1999 over the terminal to help me do this!\\n—\\nAre you out of your mind? Making a joke like that? Don't you afraid of the military?"}

Name: A Sticky Note With the Smell of Gunpowder
Title: A Sticky Note With the Smell of Gunpowder
SubContent: {1: "\\nWhat is the most unforgettable food you've ever had?\\n... Some rotten rations. I gave my rations to a wounded comrade when we were encircled by the Corrupted.\\nBut that comrade gave them back to me when I was back again... I left the trench with them.\\n... I'm not crying. It's just I have sand in my eyes. Don't say anything. Let's stay in ambush. The target is about to show up."}

Name: Simple Defector Pursuit Record
Title: Simple Defector Pursuit Record
SubContent: {1: "\\n...To our surprise, the defector didn't fight this time. After we explained why we were here, she came out from the place she hid and was willing to come back with us.\\nThis was unexpected. What was she up to?\\nI didn't know, but the mission was completed anyway."}

Name: Sticky Note on the Purifying Force's Desk
Title: Sticky Note on the Purifying Force's Desk
SubContent: {1: "I don't like tailing missions, but now that I got one... (Sighs)\\n\\nDD MM, no abnormal actions of the target.\\nDD MM, no abnormal actions of the target. Target's on a ground mission.\\nDD MM, no abnormal actions of the target.\\n...\\nDD MM, no abnormal actions of the target. Suspicion cleared.\\n\\n(Sighs) I just don't like tailing people..."}

Name: A Diary With Mud Stains
Title: A Diary With Mud Stains
SubContent: {1: "\\nI saw him. He wasn't doing well.\\nI was glad to find out that he was not doing well. He left me behind and sneaked into another conservation area when the Corrupted invaded the conservation area. He even got my relative killed.\\nI'll kill him with my gun. And I don't care if it would make me a defector.\\nI knew he saw me as well. Just wait for the end of life in fear and nightmares..."}

Name: Sticky Note on the Conservation Area's Desk
Title: Sticky Note on the Conservation Area's Desk
SubContent: {1: "...Why is the Purifying Force in charge of communications like this? Just fire a cannon shell at them and everything will be solved.\\n...\\nWhy does it take so long to negotiate? Why is it still not over? I don't like to be exposed on the table. It's dangerous\\n...\\n(A picture of a turtle painted black)\\n...\\nIt's finally over. I won't take any missions like this..."}

Name: Sticky Note on the Engineering Force's Desk
Title: Sticky Note on the Engineering Force's Desk
SubContent: {1: "\\nWhere is Karenina...? Has anyone seen her?\\n... She's fixing the cleaning tool in the back? Great... Keep her away from the broken engine... No, hide that engine away. Cover it up with the waterproof fabric. Make it look like a trash can. And then distract her.\\nWhy? It's for the sake of Babylonia. Don't ask. Just do it."}

Name: Small Note Scrawled in Anger
Title: Small Note Scrawled in Anger
SubContent: {1: "\\nI hate the Corrupted who don't respect boundaries!!!\\nWe just finished the outer area of defense in the conservation area! Why did they have to rush over it the second day after we finished it and left?\\nYou think it's fun to travel by transport craft back and forth, huh? Constructs also get airsick, okay? I didn't even have the time to fix my balance system!!!\\nI WANT THEM ALL DEAD!!!"}

Name: Sticky Note Picked up Next to the Defenses of the Conservation Area
Title: Sticky Note Picked up Next to the Defenses of the Conservation Area
SubContent: {1: "\\nWell, to be honest, those Scavengers are leading a tough life taking care of the old and young at the same time without a fixed camp or source of food.\\nBut that's not an excuse to steal. I mean, this is ridiculous. Because of them, we have to fix the defenses here almost every day while trying to figure out a way to protect everyone from the Corrupted and them.\\nIs there any way we can help them?\\nIt's really tough these days..."}

Name: Note Left in the Defenses in a Hurry
Title: Note Left in the Defenses
SubContent: {1: "\\nWe are the Support Force. Why do we have to fight battles? Shouldn't we be in charge of transportation and logistics? I don't want to fight the Corrupted! I'm just a Support Construct!\\nAhhh! They're coming!!! Help! Help! Stay away from Red! And my supplies! Go away! Go away!!!"}

Name: Sticky Note Found in the Conservation Area's Internal Emergency Room
Title: Sticky Note Found in the Conservation Area's Emergency Room
SubContent: {1: "—...Don't move. You've lost too much vital fluid. I need to bandage these two wounds first and then give you a vital fluid refill...\\n\\n—Red and my supplies...\\n\\n—Everything's fine. Captain Bridget has already gathered all the supplies and vehicles, including Red... Who would name a vehicle like that...?\\n\\n—Great...\\n\\n—Don't charge in that fast next time. You're the one who says you don't want to fight every time, but it is also you who will always be the first to rush in..."}

Name: Sticky Note on the Vehicle's Windscreen
Title: Sticky Note on the Vehicle's Windscreen
SubContent: {1: '\\nSitting on a support vehicle always gets me a bit emotional.\\nWe Support Force created this road with the wheels of our vehicles bit by bit. Our vehicles brought supplies, construction materials, exploration tools, and explorers, and sent the Golden Age away... even including the treasure of times before the Golden Age.\\nI always felt I was doing great work on every transport mission.\\nWe are working hard to... build the world.'}

Name: A Diary Page in the Vehicle Trunk
Title: A Diary Page in the Vehicle Trunk
SubContent: {1: "\\nI hung a teru teru bozu on Red's windscreen. Hope it will be sunny and without debris flows like the last one these two days.\\nThese supplies are crucial. They have to get them or they'll be out of food.\\nNot sure if the road we used last time is still there. Hope it is not damaged by the Corrupted. I hate mountain roads. They always get Red's shell dirty...\\n"}

Name: Sticky Note Left in the Conservation Area Support Force Outpost
Title: Sticky Note Left in the Support Force Outpost
SubContent: {1: "\\nI traded with the Scavengers and got the right to use this half of the road with some supplies. With this part of the road, we just need to prolong it a bit to connect this conservation area to that conservation area.\\nWe don't need to worry about the support issues between the conservation areas in the future... I can finally sleep well.\\nNext, it should be the traffic connection issues in the southern half area where debris flow takes place frequently. It must be taken good care of..."}

Name: Note With an Incoherent Message
Title: Note With an Incoherent Message
SubContent: {1: "\\nS-stop! It took 300 million years to form a stalagmite like that!!!\\nAh!!!\\nIt's that Corrupted! It hit the stalagmite! It won't get away with it!!!\\nMy stalagmite... Boohoo...\\nHuh? Just stick it back? Who said that??? Who??? Don't let me catch you!!!"}

Name: A Small Note Painted With Delicate Patterns
Title: A Small Note Painted With Delicate Patterns
SubContent: {1: "\\nFive-star rating for the transportation! It was smooth with no turbulence throughout the flight. All artworks were carefully packaged! Very thoughtful!\\nUm... May I ask if the Construct who came to help is still with you? I gave him my lounge number, but he never contacted me.\\nDid I bother him...? Could you ask him about it if you can reach him? Could you say sorry for me if I bothered him? I didn't mean to cause any trouble to him. Hope it doesn't leave him a bad impression of the WGAA..."}

Name: Simulation Hall Maintenance Sheet
Title: Simulation Hall Maintenance Sheet
